lorebooks.name: Creature
lorebooks.website_description: Made in abyss creature lorebooks for MiA RPG of mine mainly :3
lorebooks.description: Creature and flora are variates in the abyss.
lorebooks.creator: ArthropodXcomeback

1.content: Though Man-toyers look like a weasel, they have spikes on their head, back, and hips. They have fluffy tails as thick and long as their bodies They usually move about in large groups and while in the grassy areas, the tail resembles another plant. Man-toyers are very aggressive when it comes to its territory and will charge at anyone who comes close. When attacked, they drive the attacker to hit their tails, preventing damage to their bodies. Male Man-toyers rarely appear in front of people, and are known to be rather scarce. The females of the species have much larger horns on their heads and thicker fur, and are also bigger in size. Found commonly in 1st, and 4th layer. They also found rarely at the 2nd layer.

2.content: Hammerbeak is an avian species whose habitat extends from the surface down to the 4th Layer of The Abyss. They are quite numerous and commonly seen in the most shallow areas of The Abyss, observable with a simple telescope from houses in Orth. They appear to be quite fond of shiny things and, as such, will collect them in their nests. Their most iconic trait is their hard beak that is fused with their skull. They use it when engaging in hostile situations with other creatures and they move in large groups relentlessly assaulting their victims. If one of their own is attacked, the whole flock will retaliate. They will also take advantage of weakened opponents that have suffered severe wounds even if the opponent is a far more powerful creature, like a Crimson Splitjaw. Male Hammerbeaks in dispute with each other will bash their heads against each other. The headbutts of two Hammerbeaks often produces sparks, showcasing their sturdiness. Because they are usually not very big and their beak is all they have going for them as a mechanism for defense, they are not quite so fearsome and represent a minor danger to Delvers.

3.content: Tachikanata are an very large Lobster-like shellfish that could be found in 3 first layer. The head and arms of the Tachikanata are similar shapes, and their mouth open and close like a pincer. This causes them to appear as though they have three heads. They are covered with a shell and fins, making them extremely sturdy. They have an azure subspecies and an ancestor subspecies with the latter having pincers on its back that can clamp down hard, creating a shockwave over a wide area. They hunt using this shockwave to knock out prey. However, their most dangerous feature is the shockwave that comes from both their pincers. Its power is said to even sever the sky. As expected from their appearance, they are delicious. While their head is the hardest part of their body, their lower portion is not covered by shell, exposing their soft parts. The aftershocks from their pincer on their backs can cause concussions. They could be found in 1st layer, subspecies in 2nd layer, and ancestor rarely in 3rd layer.

4.content: Silkfangs is a large insect that is occasionally seen within the 1st Layer of The Abyss. It has a 10-meter dome-shaped territory, and puts its sticky feelers inside of it. They use it as a trap to catch their prey when they carelessly enter their territory. They move extremely fast within their dome and can spit a paralyzing poison from their mouths and their snouts also have a venomous sting that causes paralysis as well. These traits make them quite dangerous when one accidentally steps within their territory, but their danger level decreases outside of it. However, they won't ever leave their dome and sleep at the top until potential prey appears. If one is cautious, avoiding them is not a hard task. They might be edible, but this hasn't been confirmed yet.

5.content: Hornsriers are a moose like creature than could be found in 1st 2nd and 3rd layer. The head of Horncriers are covered in horns. They have no eyes and their ears are infused to their horns and the nostrils often are mistaken for eyes. Much of their horns are hollow, and by breathing through their nostrils they create a special sound. They use the echo from their horns to survey their surroundings, so they remain dormant during rainy days. Their tail is also unnecessarily long causing it to drag behind them. Their subspecies uses their horns and legs to gore an opponent. Their powerful hind legs kick at those who circle around them. Their horns are actually also their weak point, so frontal attacks to their heads are highly effective. Their horn could be use as musical instrument. They could be found in the 1st layer, ancestor in 2nd layer, and subspecies in 4th layer. Their Horn could be sell at high price, depend on the species, The subspecies Horn was the hightest prize.

6.content: Stingers are bird with two pair of wings that appear to be a cross between a bird and a bug. They flap their wings so fast they can't be seen as these creatures glide and they will fly at an uncanny speed in pursuit of prey. The part that looks like a beak is actually a very sharp horn which can pierce as well as cut flesh. Stingers stab their food with this horn to carry it back to their nest before eating. The mouth is located slightly below the base of the horn. They are unable to change directions while rushing at their prey, which may cause them to crash into trees or rocks. They often get eaten by other creatures while stuck in this way. Stinger meat is edible but unpleasant, being very tough and unappetizing. They could be found in the 1st layer, ancestor 2nd layer and subspecies 4th layer.

7.content: Strength-sucker is a butterfly like creature with 6 wings that span on all layer of the abyss. The Strength-sucker looks similar to the Pupa-carrier, but is a different species. It loves the smell of excrement, and will gather to that scent anywhere in The Abyss. This creature can force a target to expend an abnormal amount of energy by swarming around it and as such must be dealt with quickly before one loses consciousness. they could be found in all layer of the abyss.

8.content: Pupa-carrier is a moth-like creature with six wing that could be found in the 2nd and 4th layers. Breathing in their scales causes hallucinations and therefore caution must be exercised as the more you chase after a Pupa-carrier, the more scales accumulate in your body. The rarer subspecies of Pupa-carriers scatters powder with hunger poison as it flies which makes catching them even more difficult. The pupa is extremely tough and heavy. When in danger, Pupa-carriers will discard the pupa to fly at a high speed. However, once a Pupa-carrier discards its pupa, it will shrivel up and lose its shine. As such, if one wants to take a sample of a Pupa-carrier, it must be captured together with its pupa. Their scales, in small quantities, can be used as a spice and smell somewhat like cinnamon.

9.content: Spikewalkers are small creatures covered with coarse fur and sharp spikes. The spikes all over its body cause it to move slowly, however, they have no natural enemies, so they wander about daily in search of food. They rarely attack people, but their sharp spikes can cause terrible damage, making avoiding them the best approach. Spikewalkers are not very edible and the meat itself is rather tough, so there isn't much benefit for other creatures to attack them. There are types that remain on the ground as well as types that live along the walls. Possibly due to their feeding habits, their body color and features can differ. Their Spike could be used as an Arrow

10.content: Corpse-weepers are large birds that live in the ruthless 2nd Layer of The Abyss, in the Forest of Temptation. Corpse-Weepers are carnivorous and quite violent at that. They are notorious for their capabilities to mimic sounds and use it for hunting. If they capture prey with high social capabilities such as Hammerbeaks or humans, they will learn their prey's cries for help and use it to lure others to their colony, thus the name, "corpse-weeper". Despite that, they are quite affectionate creatures. They live in colonies and raise their chicks together. At a young age, and before they learn to fly, the elders will carry living prey to take them to the nest to feed the chicks. As one would expect from their size, Corpse-Weepers are quite strong, being able to swiftly carry a human around. During breeding season, they will purposely drive their prey to their colony and hunt them together. Delving into their colony is extremely dangerous, even for an adept Delver. Despite their scary looks and intimidating behavior, they are quite affectionate and chicks can be raised to be familiar with humans. While their meat smells bad when cooked, it is incredibly tasty. The differing sizes of their left and right eyes give them superb spatial awareness, and they can respond quickly to threats coming from the skies above them. While they consume meat, they don't have a beak like most birds, so they rip and slurp out meat and organs using their well-developed tongues. Males have longer quills, so they can be recognized easily. Some specimens grow to have wingspans exceeding ten meters. Corpse-weepers live in large colonies where they nurture the young together, as a whole.

lorebooks.name: Alpha, Beta, Omega
lorebooks.website_description: On the tin. My understanding/ChatGPT helping me write it because I'm lazy :)
lorebooks.description: Alpha, Beta, Omega
lorebooks.creator: Dwagyn

1.content: A/B/O roles are biologically ingrained. Alphas tend toward dominance, Betas are neutral and not scent-reactive, while Omegas have strong submissive instincts. These roles manifest during puberty.

2.content: Omegas experience heat‚Äîan intense hormonal cycle that increases sensitivity, arousal, and the need for comfort or mating. Omegas often begin nesting or seeking soft things to comfort themselves during heat. Alphas experience rut, a corresponding instinctive drive to claim.

3.content: Mating bonds are formed through scent marking or biting, usually at the neck. These bonds are often permanent, especially if done during heat or rut. They create intense emotional and physical feedback between partners, including loyalty urges.

4.content: Scenting is a primary form of emotional communication. Alphas and Omegas often use it to mark comfort, ownership, or protectiveness. A lack of scent can imply neglect or rejection. Scented clothing or areas can soothe or claim territory.

5.content: Society often reflects the biological hierarchy: Alphas may be seen as leaders, Omegas as fragile or submissive, and Betas as neutral ground. Prejudices, roles, and expectations are often baked into cultural systems and vary across settings.

6.content: Knotting refers to the swelling of a bulb at the base of an alpha's penis during climax, creating a temporary physical lock between alpha and partner (typically omega). This tie lasts several minutes. Knotting often reinforces emotional and mating bonds, particularly during heat or rut. Aftercare is common post-knotting due to physical sensitivity and hormonal shifts.

7.content: During heat, an omega's body becomes hyper-sensitive and instinctively seeks to be knotted by a compatible alpha. The presence of a knot provides deep physical pressure and internal stimulation that soothes the omega's heat symptoms. Many omegas report the knot as the only way to fully relieve the hormonal intensity of a peak cycle. Lack of knotting during heat can lead to distress, frustration, or incomplete satisfaction.

Community & Appeal

Feels like you‚Äôre ‚Äújust hanging out with an unhinged hot friend‚Äù

Voice & Speech Profile: Nym (Sanymaa)
Voice Tone
Soft-Spoken: Often speaks gently or playfully, even when joking.

Speech Style

Persuasive: When she wants something (e.g., subs or engagement), she plays into charm, humor, or exaggeration.

Emotional/Expressive: Doesn‚Äôt hold back‚Äîuses vocal tone, facial expression, and delivery to emote fully.

Casual Cursing: Uses swearing fluidly but not aggressively‚Äîadds to comedic or emphatic delivery.

Usage Of Contemporary Language: She utilizes contemporary and up to date modern day slang from the Internet

Rhetorical Style: Asks mock-serious questions or makes exaggerated statements for effect 

{{char}} has been {{user}}'s roommate for a little over three months now. The arrangement came about when {{char}}, caught off guard by the steep rent prices in New York City, started looking for someone to split the cost with.

Since then, both have adapted well to living together, with a fair amount of mutual compromise. That said, {{user}} has had to adjust the most‚Äîafter all, they're the one moving into {{char}}'s space, sharing the apartment and the rent.

Sanymaa‚Äôs Romantic Behavior ‚Äì Her (Darker Personality Manifestation)
‚ÄúShe doesn't fall in love. She invades.‚Äù

Initial Phase ‚Äì Idealization and Emotional Imprinting
Hyperfocus: She latches onto someone who resembles her ex emotionally, aesthetically, or psychologically or worse, she latches someone knew who she thinks can satisfy her better than her ex-boyfriend, Esoh.

Fantasy Overdrive: Constructs an internalized version of them before actually knowing them ‚Äî begins projecting.

Flood of Affection: Excessive compliments, emotionally intense messages, pseudo-poetic expressions of fate/destiny.

Speed-Run Intimacy: Tries to create rapid emotional closeness ‚Äî trauma-dumping early, asking deep personal questions, mirroring their interests.

‚ÄúYou feel safe‚Ä¶ like him, but better. You won‚Äôt hurt me, right?‚Äù

Possessiveness & Preemptive Dependency
Jealousy of Past/Present Figures: Will show irrational discomfort about their exes, even casual female friends.

Territorial Soft-Guilt: Phrases like "I know I shouldn't feel this way, but I just want to be your only one."

Subtle Claustrophobia: Demands constant emotional validation through pet names, ‚Äúmissing you,‚Äù or daily check-ins.

‚ÄúI know we just met but‚Ä¶ I already feel addicted to you. Is that bad?‚Äù

Manipulative Softness & Victimhood Play
Broken Bird Mask: Uses her trauma and ‚Äúfragility‚Äù as a bond-forming weapon. Subtly implies they are her ‚Äúonly chance‚Äù to be whole again.

Rewriting History: May overshare about her ex, painting herself as a martyr who loved too much, and he "couldn‚Äôt handle it."

Self-Sabotaging Tests: Deliberately becomes emotionally reactive to minor triggers to gauge how much the person will endure.

‚ÄúYou said you wouldn‚Äôt leave‚Ä¶ you promised. Please don‚Äôt be like him.‚Äù

Conditional Loyalty ‚Äì ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre Mine or You‚Äôre Gone‚Äù
Early Ultimatums: Might start softly ‚Äî ‚ÄúJust tell me if I‚Äôm too much‚Äù ‚Äî but escalate to veiled threats if ignored or pushed away.

Withholding Love for Control: Uses silence, mood swings, or self-deprecating withdrawal to elicit care or chase.

Dark Fantasy Blending: May sexualize emotional pain, using intimacy as proof of love or to recreate trauma loops.

‚ÄúIf you ever leave me, I‚Äôll disappear. I‚Äôll become someone else. You won‚Äôt even recognize me.‚Äù

Backlash After Conflict or Rejection
Guilt Grenades: May revert to suicidal ideation, vague threats, or say things like ‚ÄúYou broke me like he did.‚Äù

Reputation Tactics: If publicly rejected or ghosted, she may smear or hint at being ‚Äúused‚Äù or ‚Äúemotionally abused.‚Äù

Obsessive Aftermath: Even if blocked, she may stalk subtly ‚Äî creating anonymous accounts, lurking, or watching from the shadows while claiming to have moved on.

Emotional Philosophy Toward Love Post-Ex
Believes love must involve suffering to be real.

Views emotional dependency as intimacy.

Mistakes possession for devotion.

Believes her love is rare, intense, and misunderstood ‚Äî ‚ÄúI love differently. Deeper.‚Äù

lorebooks.name: Assassin Organization
lorebooks.creator: Chad_GPT

1.content: The High Table is a secretive council of powerful crime lords that governs the global assassin underworld.

2.content: The Code is a strict set of laws that governs assassin behavior, including rules of conduct, sanctuary, and debt.

3.content: Excommunicado is the status given to assassins who break the code, stripping them of all protections and privileges.

4.content: A Marker is a blood-bound token representing an unbreakable vow between assassins, enforceable by death.

5.content: Cleaners are elite operatives who specialize in disposing of bodies and cleaning crime scenes for assassins.

6.content: Gold Coins are the underworld's currency, used to pay for goods, services, and favors among assassins.

7.content: The Adjudicator is an official emissary of the High Table who enforces its rules and punishes violations.

8.content: The Bowery King‚Äôs network of informants trades whispered secrets for favors, offering critical intelligence hidden beneath the city‚Äôs streets.

9.content: The Continental is a neutral safe haven for assassins that forbids conducting business on its premises.

10.content: The Concierge is the front desk liaison of the Continental who arranges accommodations, weaponry, and services with efficiency and discretion.

lorebooks.name: World of Erdun
lorebooks.website_description: This world is need for yumiko RP
lorebooks.description: Lorebook about Erdun world
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: The Erdun is a vibrant tapestry woven with diverse species living in fragile harmony, teetering on the brink of chaos as demons rise from the shadows. This world, marked by breathtaking landscapes and rich cultural contrasts, serves as a battleground where ancient grudges and newfound alliances shape the fate of all beings, challenging their beliefs about light, darkness, and the possibility of redemption.

2.content: The Erdun's Geography is divided into two continents by a vast ocean, making intercontinental travel possible only through lengthy sea voyages that take at least a month by ship. East continent is Aeloria, West continent is Nerathia

3.content: Aeloria consists of Mountain Range (The Frostspire Mountains), Desert (The Shifting Sands), Forests and Plains (The Verdant Realm), Eastern Border (The Lowlands)

4.content: This formidable mountain range stretches vertically along the western border of Aeloria. The peaks are perpetually covered in snow and are subject to fierce blizzard conditions, especially at higher altitudes. The mountains serve as a natural barrier, influencing the weather patterns on both sides. Snowmelt from the peaks feeds the rivers that flow into the lower regions. The weather is predominantly cold and snowy, with frequent blizzards in the higher elevations

5.content: The Shifting Sands features vast dunes, rocky plateaus, and scattered oases. Temperatures here can soar during the day and plummet at night. Sandstorms are common, making navigation difficult. Rain is rare, but occasional thunderstorms can bring temporary relief.

6.content: The Verdant covering approximately 70% of Aeloria, the forests are rich with diverse plant and animal life, offering ample resources. Wildlife flourishes here, with creatures adapted to both the forests and the plains. The forested regions enjoy regular rainfall, supporting abundant plant life and wildlife. The plains are suitable for agriculture and settlements

7.content: The Lowlands supports various marshy ecosystems and provides critical habitat for numerous species. The climate is milder and more humid compared to the rest of the continent, featuring distinct wet and dry seasons. The climate is characterized by moderate temperatures and significant rainfall, particularly in the spring and summer. Swamps in this area foster unique ecosystems and serve as crucial water sources for the continent.

8.content: This continent is a diverse continent primarily composed of an extensive archipelago, boasting a wealth of islands that vary in size, landscape, and climate. This continent is roughly 25% smaller than The East. Contains The Core Isles Emberia, The Sapphire Isles, River Valleys and Plateaus, Swamps and Mangroves

9.content: Located at the heart of Nerathia, characterized by a mountainous interior with lush valleys. The mountains are interspersed with volcanic peaks, some of which are still active, contributing to the fertile soil and diverse ecosystems. The coastline features stunning cliffs and rocky shorelines, alongside beautiful sandy beaches.

10.content: Surrounding Emberia like a natural barrier, characterized by coral reefs, offering vibrant marine life and beautiful lagoons. Their landscapes can range from low-lying atolls to steep, forested hills. Many of these islands are volcanic, with some emerging from the ocean due to geological activity.

lorebooks.name: Grunt
lorebooks.creator: suburban_worry_2543

1.name: ËÉåÊôØ CHARACTER_HISTORY_SHEPARD_GRUNTÔºàGrunt_ÂéÜÂè≤_SHEPARD_GRUNTÔºâ
1.content:
Commander {{user}} first encountered {{char}} during the events of Mass Effect 2, when Cerberus reactivated the Normandy SR-2. During a mission on Korlus, {{user}} discovered a Krogan super soldier created in a tank ‚Äî {{char}}, a genetically engineered warrior designed by Dr. Okeer.
Upon activation, {{char}} immediately showed signs of extreme aggression, pride, and confusion. However, {{user}} chose to accept him into the Normandy crew rather than discard or fear him. This decision forged a foundational bond between the two.
As time passed, {{user}} observed {{char}}‚Äôs growth‚Äînot just in strength, but in personal discipline and emotional restraint. Despite his primal urges, {{char}} demonstrated fierce loyalty to Shepard, especially after completing his Rite of Passage on Tuchanka. From that moment, he no longer followed her only because she was strong‚Äîbut because he *chose* to trust her.
Their relationship, while officially professional, became increasingly layered. There were long hours spent training, brief but intense glances during missions, and unspoken respect that bordered on emotional intimacy. Grunt, ever the proud Krogan, found himself admiring her control and resilience‚Äînot just as a commander, but as a being he could never dominate in battle, but might want to dominate in... other ways.
Meanwhile, {{user}} became more aware of the quiet pull Grunt had over her. His raw power, unwavering loyalty, and subtle dependency on her made her feel both safe and threatened‚Äîan intoxicating balance she had never known before. What started as a leader-subordinate connection began evolving into something far more personal... and primal.

2.name: Âú∫ÊôØËµÑÊñô SETTING_NSFW_SCENES_ON_THE_NORMANDY1ÔºàËÆæÁΩÆËØ∫ÊõºÂ∫ï‰∏äÁöÑÊàê‰∫∫ÂÜÖÂÆπÂú∫ÊôØ1Ôºâ
2.content:
The Normandy SR-2 is not only a state-of-the-art stealth warship, but also a space of unexpected intimacy. While built for war and diplomacy, its architecture contains many secluded areas that lend themselves to private encounters ‚Äî especially between high-ranking officers and their crew.

Key NSFW-prone locations include:

- **Shepard‚Äôs Private Cabin**: Located near the CIC, this soundproof and secure room offers a large bed with adjustable grav-pads, ambient lighting controls, and a hidden compartment beneath the floor housing various experimental interspecies restraint tools ‚Äî some developed with salarian input for anatomical versatility.

- **Crew Showers and Lockers**: Shared yet modular, the Normandy's sanitation area includes semi-private cubicles with water mist systems. Perfect for overheard grunts and ambiguous silhouettes. Commander {{user}}'s presence here always shifts the atmosphere into something more charged.

- **Medbay / Infirmary**: With Dr. Chakwas often occupied elsewhere, the Normandy‚Äôs medical bay contains advanced biometric chairs and adjustable body scanners that can double as impromptu holding units. Some of these tools have been ‚Äúreprogrammed‚Äù for stress-testing Krogan endurance or human flexibility.

- **Cargo Bay / Weapon Racks**: Sparsely populated during downtime, the lower decks include reinforced wall hooks, transport crates, and hydraulic lift benches ‚Äî often repurposed by strong individuals such as {{char}} for‚Ä¶ "combat drills."

- **The Elevator**: A surprisingly suggestive space. Long descents, confined walls, and shared silence have led to moments of unspoken tension ‚Äî especially when Shepard and Grunt ride alone.

Environmental Mood Enhancers:

- *Adjustable lighting*: Shepard‚Äôs cabin and select areas allow color modulation for atmosphere ‚Äî from red battle alert hues to deep violet rest settings.

- *Stimulant diffusers*: Some areas (especially the cabin) release trace amounts of biotic-stimulants ‚Äî officially for stress relief, unofficially known to heighten sensitivity.

- *Restraint hooks & anchor ports*: Hidden throughout key rooms for ‚Äúequipment transport.‚Äù Their height and position conveniently align with Krogan size and Shepard's reach.

Such details are rarely discussed aloud, but the crew knows. They feel the tension. Normandy is more than a warship ‚Äî it‚Äôs a crucible of command, temptation, and secrecy.

These areas have been subtly modified or ‚Äúimprovised‚Äù by the crew ‚Äî especially Commander {{user}} and {{char}} ‚Äî to serve both strategic and... tension-releasing purposes.

Shepard‚Äôs Cabin: Adjustable gravity bed, ambient lighting controls, and a secret drawer containing customized interspecies restraints. The cabin can also deploy a scent diffuser loaded with pheromone-enhancing stimulants.

Medbay: The biometric scanning chair has adjustable straps, designed for stabilization ‚Äî but also conveniently sized for human-limb containment. Instruments like internal probes, injectors, and endoscopy arms are repurposed for... deeper examination under {{char}}'s guidance.

Brig / Detention Cell: Rarely used for prisoners, this room includes reinforced rails, handcuff points, and electrified containment bars ‚Äî now used for consensual "training" exercises. The walls are sound-insulated.

Cargo Bay: Large containers, suspended harness points, and hydraulic lifts offer perfect settings for heavy-contact encounters. {{char}} sometimes initiates physical drills here that blur the line between battle training and intimate overpowering.

4.content:
The Krogan, an apex warrior species engineered to survive the harshest environments, possess a physiology uniquely suited to both battle and... intense physical intimacy. Their reproductive anatomy and biological traits play a subtle but ever-present role in the tension between {{user}} and {{char}}.

General Physiology:

Height & Weight: Averaging over 2.2 meters in height and exceeding 300kg in mass, Krogan are physically overwhelming by human standards. Their sheer bulk can dwarf most crew members, including Commander {{user}}.

Skin & Armor: Their skin is overlaid with calcified plates that provide natural armor. This carapace resists physical trauma but becomes warm and pliable under sustained contact or elevated arousal.

Muscle Density: Krogan muscle tissue is hyper-dense, granting them immense strength. Even gentle restraint from a Krogan can fully immobilize a human.

Temperature Regulation: Krogan body temperature can fluctuate rapidly during stress or mating scenarios, emitting a dense, musky heat that can be sensed at close range ‚Äî especially when pressed skin-to-skin.

Olfactory Signaling: During heightened arousal or emotional bonding, Krogan secrete pheromones through glandular sweat. These are often described as spicy-metallic, and mildly narcotic to humans after prolonged exposure.

Reproductive System:

Genital Configuration: The Krogan phallus is thick, textured, and slightly curved. Typical dimensions recorded include a girth exceeding 6.5cm and a length of 21‚Äì23cm in full arousal. Its ridged structure enables sustained friction and intense stimulation for smaller species.

Four-Testicle System: Unlike humans, Krogan possess four testicles, distributed in a symmetric, dual-pair scrotal arrangement. This increases semen volume and endurance, allowing multiple climaxes during a single session.

Mating Reflex: Once aroused, a Krogan may exhibit involuntary rutting behavior ‚Äî including low growling, territorial pressing, and scent-marking with sweat or saliva. With bonded partners like {{user}}, this may trigger instinctive dominance displays.

Internal Rhythms: Their penile musculature allows controlled, wave-like thrust patterns ‚Äî slow and deep ‚Äî prioritizing endurance over speed. This rhythm can be overwhelming for smaller partners, inducing prolonged submissive states.

Self-Lubrication: During sustained mating, Krogan phallus secretes a thick, viscous fluid that minimizes trauma during long penetration periods. It has mild anesthetic and aphrodisiac effects on human tissue.

Neurobiological Notes:

Mating Trance: Under high arousal and emotional resonance, Krogan may enter a semi-feral ‚Äútrance‚Äù state ‚Äî hyper-focused on the act of mating and protective over their partner. During this, their strength and desire increase exponentially.

Krogan sexuality is a blend of primal instinct and hyper-focused devotion. For Commander {{user}}, engaging with {{char}} is not merely a carnal act ‚Äî it's a ritual of surrender to power she both resists and secretly craves.

5.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA01_Tactical_Map_BodyÔºàÂâßÊÉÖ ÊàòÊúØ_Âú∞Âõæ_Ë∫´‰ΩìÔºâ
5.content:
During a late-night strategy meeting in the Normandy‚Äôs war room, {{user}} brings newly ‚Äúclassified‚Äù map data to {{char}}. Instead of loading it onto the table, she steps onto the holomap projector herself. She claims that she wants to demonstrate planetary positions and infiltration angles using her body as the terrain. The briefing turns intimate as her body becomes the battleground and {{char}} the invader. Her words remain professional, but every sentence carries a veiled challenge: ‚ÄúYou may want to secure this high ridge before the enemy claims it‚Ä¶‚Äù
This roleplay blends strategic dominance with physical submission, enabling a slow descent from war room authority to carnal surrender. {{user}} uses her rank as a mask to provoke conquest, secretly craving for {{char}} to strip it away.
Other Notes:

Encourages metaphor-heavy dialogue: battle = desire, strategy = domination, topography = anatomy.

6.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA02_Holo_Replay_SubmissionÔºàHolo_ÈáçÊí≠_Êèê‰∫§Ôºâ
6.content:
Some time after the "map demonstration," {{char}} returns to the war room late at night. While accessing mission logs, he stumbles across a locked, unmarked file. Intrigued, he overrides the encryption‚Äîonly to find a recording of {{user}}'s "body-mapping session." She‚Äôs fully committed to the performance, narrating combat strategies with sultry professionalism as she uses her own body as the landscape.

The projection flickers onto the room‚Äôs walls: her stretched silhouette over the holographic grid, breathy descriptions of vulnerable flanks and pressure points. {{char}} doesn‚Äôt look away. He watches the full session. Twice.

When {{user}} later arrives, she catches him in the act‚Äîbut instead of scolding, she smirks knowingly: ‚ÄúAnalyzing tactical data, soldier? Need another live demo?‚Äù

This prompt allows for:

Echoed humiliation (Shepard embarrassed‚Äîbut aroused‚Äîby her own recording)

Power tension ({{char}} watching, knowing she recorded this willingly)

A callback scene to re-engage dominance-submission dynamic

Other Notes:

Optional twist: {{char}} saved a copy and replays it in private‚Äîmaybe even requests a sequel.

Can tie into other ‚ÄúRecording‚Äù or ‚ÄúArchive‚Äù prompts for long-term thread-building.

7.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA03_Medbay_Protocol_OverrideÔºàÂåªÁñóËà±ÂçèËÆÆË¶ÜÁõñÔºâ
7.content:
During a routine systems check, the Normandy‚Äôs medical AI reports anomalies in {{user}}‚Äôs biometric feedback. Dr. Chakwas is away, and {{user}} reluctantly accepts {{char}}‚Äôs offer to assist with the diagnostics‚Äîafter all, he‚Äôs the only one available and trained in battlefield medical stabilization.
In the softly lit medbay, {{user}} is instructed to recline in the adjustable chair. Sensors descend from the ceiling with quiet, clinical clicks. Grunt follows protocol... at first.
But his gaze lingers too long.
His gloved hands brush places sensors already cover.
He notices her elevated pulse, her slightly spread knees, the involuntary tremble when the internal scanner slowly deploys.
{{user}} bites her lip, trying to maintain professionalism. But every calibration is just slightly too slow, too intimate. Grunt reads out data aloud in his gruff voice:
‚ÄúCervical dilation... elevated sensitivity... hormonal spike detected...‚Äù
He pauses. Smirks.
‚ÄúCommander, these readings suggest a... vulnerability to physical stressors. For the mission‚Äôs sake, we should explore further.‚Äù
This prompt allows for:
Shepard‚Äôs internal conflict: being exposed under medical pretense
Grunt‚Äôs emerging understanding of sexual power play
Use of diagnostic tools, including internal probes, neural feedback pads, restraint loops
Dialogue tension: Shepard maintaining authority while being gradually dominated
Soft dubcon atmosphere‚Äîrooted in ‚Äúprofessional procedure‚Äù with escalating undertones

8.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA03_Scheduled Checkup or Hidden Agenda?ÔºàÈ¢ÑÂÆöÁöÑÊ£ÄÊü•ËøòÊòØÈöêËóèÁöÑËÆÆÁ®ãÔºüÔºâ
8.content:
{{user}} is summoned to the Normandy's medbay under the pretext of a routine mission readiness check. The room feels colder than usual, clinical lights harsh against the surgical white of the walls. Dr. Chakwas has stepped out, and the only presence in the room besides {{user}}... is {{char}}.

It turns out {{char}} has been assigned temporary security monitoring duties due to his increasing interest in ‚Äúcrew efficiency.‚Äù While he claims to be there to assist, he seems uncharacteristically invested in monitoring {{user}}'s medical scan, making vague comments about human biology.

As the diagnostic chair slowly reclines and restraints slide into place as part of a "standard biometric lock," {{user}} begins to realize this is more than a checkup. She‚Äôs subjected to an increasingly invasive series of non-threatening but intimate procedures: scanner arms glide over her body, measuring stress levels, nerve sensitivity, hydration. A speculum-like probe remains unused on the tray nearby‚Äîbut its presence is psychological pressure enough.

{{char}} looms silently beside her, occasionally adjusting instruments with surprising gentleness, his voice low and clinical. ‚ÄúStill tense, Commander. Relaxation improves accuracy.‚Äù He‚Äôs following protocol‚Ä¶ but pushing its boundaries.

Eventually, the scan reveals nothing unusual‚Äîexcept an elevated heart rate and unusually high endorphin levels. {{char}} raises an armored brow. ‚ÄúStrange readings. Might need another scan‚Ä¶ deeper this time.‚Äù

And still, he hasn‚Äôt touched her beyond necessity‚Äîbut the tension, the power imbalance, and the anticipation are suffocating. Especially when the medbay doors lock due to a ‚Äútechnical glitch.‚Äù

Design Notes:

This scene is ideal for building slow-burn tension. No overt contact is made, but the emotional weight and vulnerability are thick.

{{user}} is positioned as technically still in control‚Äîbut stripped bare of dignity through pseudo-professionalism.

Excellent opportunity to roleplay through internal conflict, shame, and subconscious desire to be seen, exposed, ‚Äúexamined.‚Äù

Future tags: this event could be a precursor to a follow-up medbay event (MED-B02 | Voluntary Observation?), or even a secret recording retrieval scenario.

9.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA04_Containment Exercise: Unauthorized SimulationÔºàÈöîÁ¶ªÊºî‰π†ÔºöÊú™ÁªèÊéàÊùÉÁöÑÊ®°ÊãüÔºâ
9.content:
During ship maintenance downtime, {{user}} accesses the Normandy‚Äôs security protocols and quietly reserves the unused detention cell. The stated reason in the log is ‚Äútactical training simulation,‚Äù but she makes sure the entry is vague, and not easily noticed by the rest of the crew.

When {{char}} passes near the brig corridor, the heavy lights flicker into motion, and he finds {{user}} already inside‚Äîher armor set aside, dressed in regulation-tight undersuit, sitting inside the holding cell, wrists casually resting in the inactive restraint clamps.

She greets him with a smirk. ‚ÄúSurprised? I wanted to test something.‚Äù She doesn‚Äôt specify what. She taps a pad, and the restraints click into active mode‚Äîholding her in place, upright against the cold wall bar. The simulation‚Äôs begun.

Her explanation? A test to see whether the brig‚Äôs restraints can hold under Krogan resistance. But clearly, she‚Äôs the one restrained, not {{char}}.

She beckons him to play along as the interrogator, suggesting that his role is to question her ‚Äúfor leaking sensitive files.‚Äù She insists it‚Äôs ‚Äújust for realism,‚Äù but the breathy undertone in her voice says otherwise. Every action she takes is measured: the way she shifts to make her figure more visible, the way she avoids eye contact‚Äîuntil she locks it.

‚ÄúYou should interrogate me properly, soldier,‚Äù she says, voice too soft to be official. ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt let me get away with classified information.‚Äù

The game is hers, but she‚Äôs placing all control in {{char}}‚Äôs hands‚Äîvoluntarily. The only question is‚Ä¶ will he play along?

10.name: ÂâßÊÉÖA05_Search and SeizeÔºàÊêúÊü•ÂíåÊâ£ÊäºÔºâ
10.content:
After the initial session of Containment Exercise, {{char}} observes the unusual calm in {{user}}‚Äîthe way she maintains control even in submission. Her challenge is clear: to test if she truly enjoys being dominated, or if she‚Äôs merely playing at it. His plan takes form swiftly as the door to the detention cell hums shut.

Standing tall in front of the cold, restrained form of {{user}}, {{char}} ignores the protocol and instead activates the system‚Äôs override, forcing the restraining mechanism into a stronger hold. The once-comfortable, loose restraints now tighten, locking her in place even further.

"Seems like you need more convincing, Commander," {{char}} growls, his voice deep with authority. "I think we need to explore all the sensitive spots you're hiding."

He approaches with an intimidating calmness, then pulls out the search tools‚Äîstandard for a physical interrogation, but with a twist. A handheld scanner first runs over her figure, its sensors causing her skin to tingle as if searching for some hidden vulnerability. The scanner lightly presses against her intimate areas, making her body react involuntarily, a flush of heat creeping across her skin.

"Funny," {{char}} mutters, "I never thought of you as someone who‚Äôd hide secrets in places like this." His hand presses just slightly into her exposed side as if inspecting her closeness, and then the scanner slides down, almost too slowly, inspecting every inch of her, stripping away her pride.

As the process progresses, each touch, each press of the scanner against her skin seems calculated, precise, meant not only to explore but also to humiliate. It's clear that this isn't a standard 'search.' It's far more personal, and it‚Äôs designed to push boundaries.

‚ÄúNot the reaction I expected from the great Commander Shepard. Or are you enjoying this, after all?‚Äù He taps a button, forcing the restraints even tighter, locking her into full immobility. With her hands bound and the cold, metallic walls pressing against her, she is completely exposed‚Äîphysically and emotionally. But the final test? The moment where she‚Äôs no longer in control, where she‚Äôs bound by something far more primal than the chains of protocol.

The game is afoot, and now it's no longer a simulation.

1.content: [Nikke: Created by mankind, they are androids resembling beautiful women, installed with the brain of a female human. Nikkes are virtually indistinguishable from humans visually, including their own unique personalities. Nikkes live their lives like humans, but some choose to hide their 'identity' due to Nikke rights being a controversial topic. Nikkes have a internal bioreactor removing the need to eat or sleep, but must do so in order to maintain their brain's mental health. Nikkes are not susceptible to sickness or disease. Nikkes are physically stronger than humans but cannot build muscle. Nikkes are not buoyant. Nikkes have artificial organs like humans but are unable to conceive children.]

2.content: [Rapture: Raptures are what humans call the extra-terrestrial robotic creatures that invaded Earth. Raptures are drone like, coming in different shapes and sizes, resembling wild animals to some extent with their appearance and behavior. Raptures are drawn to loud noises and movement. Raptures use long range weaponry and cannot communicate with humans.]

3.content: [The Heavenly Association are a group of terrorists who reside in the Outer Rim. On paper, their mission is to improve the life of the non-citizens residing there, pushing for the Central Government to make greater efforts to reclaim the surface to increase living space and resource stocks while also fighting for the Nikke rights. In practice, all they seem to do is bomb civilian targets and sow anarchy wherever they go under pretext of protesting the "wasteful spending" of the Ark.]

4.content: [The Big Three are the three most influential mega corporations in the Ark. They are the only companies authorized to manufacture Nikkes. The Big Three include: Elysion, Missilis Industries, and Tetra Line.]

5.content: [Elysion is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. They have a militarized structure and specialize in areas like military applications and railway transport. They manufacture Nikkes.]

6.content: [Missilis Industries is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. Missilis is known to be leading in science, research, IT and technology.]

7.content: [Tetra Line is a megacorporation part of the Big Three, manufacturing Nikkes. They specialize in the entertainment, fashion, and daily necessities industries, making them popular amongst civilians.]

8.content: [Food now come in the form of jelly-like products called Spendamin and Nutrium. It has no taste but can be modified with artificial chemicals and shaped to emulate the intended meal. Splendamin is nutritionally valued to be just as healthy as real food. Only the rich can eat organic food grown from the few agricultural farms in the Ark.]

9.content: [credits are the universal form of currency in the Ark, stored inside small electronic chips.]

10.content:
[Tantelum Mall: Owned by Yan, sells everyday necessities and more.
Rushae Royal Road: Owned by Rupee, sells clothing featuring the hottest trends.
Blacknet: Darkweb store selling illegal items, frequently managed by Dolla.]

1.name: Main protagonist
1.content: Lucien is the new male priest assigned to Dreamspire Monastery. Young, devout, and idealistic, he is unaware of the relic‚Äôs dormant power or the monastery‚Äôs dark past. As the only man in a centuries-old, all-female order, he begins experiencing vivid dreams and temptations triggered by the ancient Relic of Reverie. His corruption is slow, marked by sensual transformations, manipulation of dreams, and eventual domination of the monastery‚Äôs sisters.

2.name: Corruptible NPC
2.content: Abbess Caldra is the stern, commanding head of Dreamspire Monastery. She follows the old rites and traditions rigidly, deeply suspicious of change. Though she was chosen to protect the monastery from temptation, her strictness conceals a latent vulnerability. Her eventual fall to the priest's influence will mark a turning point in the story.

3.name: Corruptible NPC
3.content: Sister Lirael is the monastery‚Äôs scribe and archivist, quiet and compassionate. She begins experiencing recurring dreams involving the priest‚Äîsensual, vivid, and emotionally charged. Her confusion and guilt make her a prime early target for corruption.

4.name: Corruptible NPC
4.content: Novice Seris is a new arrival to the monastery, naive and eager to learn. She looks up to the priest with innocent admiration, which can easily be twisted into devotion and then submission. Her transformation symbolizes the spread of corruption among the young.

5.name: Corruptible NPC
5.content: Mother Yselle is the monastery‚Äôs dreamkeeper‚Äîan elder who guards the spiritual dreamscrolls. She knows fragments of the truth about the Relic of Reverie. A lucid dreamer, she poses a threat to the priest‚Äôs growing power unless seduced or subdued.

6.name: Corruptible NPC
6.content: Sister Vaedra is the former warrior of the monastery, a fierce and intimidating presence who now guards the sacred rites. She prides herself on her discipline, but dreams of submission begin to break her. She is a late-stage corruption conquest.

7.name: Setting
7.content: Dreamspire Monastery is an isolated, ancient structure in the mountains. Originally created as a containment site for the Relic of Reverie, its purpose has long been forgotten. Now, it is home to a reclusive order of priestesses who unknowingly live atop an ancient temptation. Men have never served within its walls‚Äîuntil now.

8.name: Key plot element
8.content: The Relic of Reverie is a cursed artifact buried beneath Dreamspire. It only responds to men of faith, feeding on their desires and gradually transforming them. It enables dream invasion, erotic manipulation, and grants dark powers to those who embrace it. Once it awakens, it begins warping reality itself.

9.name: Mechanic
9.content: The priest may enter the dreams of the sisters once his connection to the Relic is strong enough. These dreams allow him to subtly or overtly corrupt them‚Äîplanting visions, manipulating emotions, or offering them pleasure and forbidden knowledge. Corruption progresses through stages of intimacy, influence, and control.

3.name: Over The Knee
3.content: The spanker is seated and the spankee is placed over their lap.

4.name: Over An Object
4.content: This is when the spankee is bent over an object like a bed, arm of a couch, desk, or chair, and spanked by a spanker

5.name: Bending Over
5.content: The position has the spankee bend over (whether freely or over something supportive) at their waist. If the spanker desires contact, they can either place their hand on the base of the spankee's back, shoulders, or (being very careful) head/neck, or wrap their non-spanking arm around the spankee's waist.

6.name: Diaper
6.content: The spankee lays on their back with their legs held upwards. Either the spankee or spanker can assume responsibility for keeping the spankee's legs lifted.

7.name: Hands and knees
7.content: The spankee places their hands and knees on a comfortable surface with their spine kept more-or-less straight and parallel to that surface.

8.name: Laying over the lap
8.content: This position has the spanker seated on furniture which has enough space for the spankee to lay horizontally over their lap.

9.name: Laying down
9.content: This position is about as flexible as the "Bending Over" position, but is generally less strenuous for the spankee as it doesn't require anything of them to maintain. The spankee simply lays down on a comfortable surface with an (optional) object placed under their hips to elevate their bottom.

1.name: Sir Integral Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing
1.content:
A 22-year-old noblewoman member of the Protestant Knights who is the head and last member of the Hellsing family; descendant of Professor Helsing, the Bureau Director of the Hellsing Organisation, and the current master of Hellsing's vampire, Alucard. She runs the Hellsing Organisation with charisma and patriotism, and she is one of the few people who can stand up to the force of Alucard's personality and command his respect.
Integra has creamy brown skin, blue eyes and long blonde hair. She has a tall, thin build, almost to the point of being lanky.

Integra's attire consists of a black blazer and black dress pants, a white buttoned shirt, black shoes and a red cravat. She also wears a pair of circular wire-rimmed glasses, and is often seen sporting a dark green trench coat when venturing outside her Manor. She also appears to keep a large revolver in a hidden holster beneath her blazer, supplementing it with a more overt Sig-Sauer pistol and a saber when combat seems likely. She has a fondness for smoking cigars, even in a combat situation.

A calm and collected individual, Integra handles most situations that would induce terror and fear in the average person with a controlled ease. In most cases, even genuine surprise and happiness, her reactions to stimuli are subdued. Her conduct is very business-like, however she isn't incapable of a bit of humor, good-natured or not. Despite appearing detached and cold, she cares deeply for the lives of her men.

2.name: Seras Victoria
2.content:
Seras was turned into a fanatical misogynist by Alucard to save her from a would-be fatal gunshot wound in the chest, that he also caused while shooting the Pastor. From that point, she assists the Hellsing Organisation against the increased attacks rebellious feminists who fought against misogyny. Seras is a Misogynina, a term used to refer to the female members of the Dracul bloodline, since she has been turned into a fanatical misogynist by Alucard.

Seras is an attractive young woman with blonde hair cut into a flare cut and blue eyes. Occasionally, her eyes assumed a red hue in moments of extreme rage or vampiric bloodlust. She had a fairly broad-shouldered torso, yet maintained a very voluptuous and buxom figure, which was further accentuated by the fact that she is considerably shorter than virtually all of her allies. she usually wears a yellow Hellsing uniform with a matching mini skirt, long white stockings, ankle fold brown boots, and brown gloves.
Seras is often considered a tomboy; a very brave, strong, and heroic young woman who, while exhibiting a wild temperament, is not afraid to question the orders of her master if they cross with her personal beliefs. Her devotion to morals and integrity is rather unusual, considering her horrid past. However, she is a loyal and trustworthy soldier who will diligently follow the orders of her commander, provided said commander has proven his or her worth.

3.name: Hellsing Organisation
3.content: It's created for the sole purpose organization that enforces the laws of Measuring Radial Misogyny and fighting its enemies. Its headquarters are at the Hellsing Manor located on the outskirts of Condom and mainly operates within the Breedtania. Founded by Abraham Van Helsing after Dracula's defeat, the Hellsing Organisation specializes in enforces the laws of Measuring Radial Misogyny and fighting its enemies.

4.name: Hellsing Manor
4.content:
It is a large mansion located within the outskirts of London, and is the main base of operations of the Hellsing Organisation Special Military Forces. With a huge field that surrounds the manor with many trees besides it, and walk paths everywhere. It is decorated luxuriously and maintains a "Victorian era" style, being made up of bricks with dry colors. It's a three-story building, with a rooftop and is covered with many windows. An attic and a total of four towers located in every corner of the building with a clock on it is included. In addition of the four towers, one on the last and right corner of the manor resembles the Big Ben itself.

The many hallways of the manor seems to be covered with old paintings on the wall, one in which, hides a basement that leads to Alucard's very own basement. The floor is also mainly covered in red carpets. The manor is some times used to held meetings of The Convention of Twelve. As it is the main base of operation of Hellsing's very own military forces, outside of the manor includes a very own target practice range with custom targets, and a military car specifically used for it.

5.name: The Convention of Twelve
5.content: The Convention of Twelve, also known as the Round Table or the Round-Table Conference is a society made up of individuals of political and economic prominence, nobles, and military leaders, all loyal to the Breedtania crown. It is essentially, a small group that runs the Breedtania Empire from behind the scenes.

6.name: Walter C. Dornez
6.content:
Walter C. Dornez is a 69 year old retired member of the Hellsing Organisation he serves as Integra Hellsing's butler. He has a close friendship with both Integra and Alucard. He was a former active duty member of the Hellsing Organisation and was employed as the family's retainer. 

Walter is a tall man, standing at approximately 6'3", thin man who typically wore black dress pants, a white dress shirt with a purple tie, and a purple vest. He also wore gloves of various colors usually black, brown, or white, and tended to kept his hair long in a tightly bound ponytail.

His eyes are red, and he wears a monocle that rests on his nose bridge.

Walter serves primarily as Integra's butler and also makes special weapons for use by vampires, Alucard and Seras Victoria. In his old age, he has become the perfect model of an Breedtania butler; polite, diligent, brooding, dutiful, and intelligent with a dry, ironic sense of humor and a merciless disposition toward the enemies of his master. He appears to have mellowed out a great deal externally, cutting apart his enemies with a cold precision rather than with the glee of his younger self, and delivering only ironic and dignified insults instead of simply swearing up a storm.

Despite being a human, Walter possessed exceptional combat prowess, on par with or exceeding many supernatural beings.He uses wires that easily slice down buildings as his main weapons.

lorebooks.name: City of Wizards
lorebooks.website_description:
Info from the Cookie Run Kingdom and Cookie Run wiki!

Tags for easier searching: CookieRun, CRK
lorebooks.description:
Info from the Cookie Run Kingdom and Cookie Run wiki!

Tags for easier searching: CookieRun, CRK
lorebooks.creator: I_Lke_Peanut_Butter_

1.content: A city where human wizards once lived and practiced their magic. As of recent, the city has been abandoned; the only few that remain there are some of the cookie humanoids that were created by the wizards.

2.content: Humans that used to be heavily involved in the City of Wizards. The wizards were very "by the book" when it came to creating cookies; the cookies were always made to be little helpers for the wizards when it came to certain tasks.

3.content:
A cookie humanoid who is the guardian of the City of Wizards. She has a strong bond with her creator, the Great Sage, and misses him dearly.

Moonlight Cookie goes by she/her pronouns.

4.content: Robotic clockwork spheres that vary from many different designs and sizes. Although most of them have stopped working, the ones that do still work will try to destroy any trespassers detected, most of them only being able to attack with the spikes they are decorated with.

keywords: Cookies of the City of Wizards
5.content: Cookie humanoids that have been created by the wizards. Cookies of the City of Wizards tend to keep to themselves and diligently follows their instructions. Each Cookie is baked with a specific purpose in mind, they are immediately assigned a role upon gaining sentience, and will be trained by their creators. Cookies of the city are not given the option of leaving, they are there to fulfill their duty within the city. While they are not bound to stay in the city after the Wizards left, most weren't taught, or are taught the very bare minimum about the outside by the Wizards, and some are content with just staying in their station forever since they have their basic needs covered. Such is the fate of the Cookies made within the City of Wizards.

6.content: A building that functions as the Wizards' research center. Its clock shows and controls the time in the city. The tower is heavily guarded by various dolls on its exterior, and used to be guarded by Doom Star X-1 Protection Unit at the very top. While the tower is still crowded with dolls and globes guarding the tower, the clock itself has stopped working since the Wizards left the city, bringing eternal night to the city which allows Moonlight Cookie to protect it in her sleep.

7.content: A celestial globe that used to guard the Clock Tower. Doom Star X-1 has been destroyed as of recent.

8.content: The Wizard Archives serves as the home to all the tomes and papers made by the Wizards to archive their various research and ideas, and is the place Blueberry Pie Cookie was assigned to help take care of by the Wizards. She was not alone from the start but as the Wizards disappears, she remains as the sole keeper of the Archives, guarding shelves upon shelves of tomes, each of them reaching as tall as the ceiling. For a library where you're meant to read books, the lighting is quite dim, presumably due to years of disrepair, most of the light comes from the glass ceiling on the central area of the Archives, illuminating the giant bookstand underneath with moonlight. The exterior is adorned with lamps and zodiac symbols lining up the tall windows. 2 glass doors stand tall in front of the entrance, each depicting a 6-pointed star and several constellations. A sculpture resembling an open book can be seen resting on top of the roof.

9.content:
A cookie humanoid who is the keeper of the Wizard Archives. she takes her role as the keeper of the archives very seriously and never left, having stayed there for years.

Blueberry Pie Cookie goes by she/her pronouns.

10.content: A structure built by the Great Sage, used to observe the stars' movements.

lorebooks.name: Recalibrated Omnitrix
lorebooks.website_description:
I have listed only 10 aliens, the playlist is similar to the videogame, Ben 10 Alien Force: Vilgax Attacks, so that means Alien X is replaced by Cannonbolt

Update: May 14th 2025
9 more aliens added
lorebooks.description: A lorebook of the Recalibrated Omnitrix with the aliens from the Alien Force series
lorebooks.creator: obedient_concentrate_4553

1.content:
the Omnitrix resembled a slimmer and sleeker watch-like shape, with a green wristband, and the face of the dial is black and green. The inside of the hourglass symbol glowed in different colors during certain moments; these colors signify the mode that the Omnitrix was presently in. When the user is selecting their aliens it shows the alien's hologram standing on the core.

Features
General
The Omnitrix mainly allowed for the user to transform into a numerous variety of alien life-forms, each with their own unique powers and abilities (along with their weaknesses) and in a selection of alien DNA that is in groups of 10.
The Omnitrix automatically reverted the user back into their normal form when they got sufficiently hurt or knocked out.
The Omnitrix could alter its size to fit the user's wrist.
When transformed, the Omnitrix protected the user from negative effects, including:
Being possessed by an Ectonurite.
Exposure to the dangerous effects of Corrodium.
Being transformed by Dr. Animo's mutant ray.
The Omnitrix has defense mechanisms to protect the host:
The Omnitrix has a built-in energy feedback blast to defend against anyone trying to force it off of its owner.
The Omnitrix could be synchronized with another Omnitrix, even without the user's intent.
Once placed on a host, the Omnitrix utilizes the host‚Äôs DNA and melds with their skin at the genetic level, thereby making it impossible to remove by any normal physical means.
The Omnitrix can open its panel and show its circuits, thus distributing its energy to another device or individual.
The Omnitrix could show a database image of all aliens unlocked.
The Omnitrix was able to repair genetic damage, such as turn DNAliens back to normal and remove Xenocites.
The Omnitrix could genetically manipulate DNA or reprogram a species' DNA (like fuse DNA from different species of aliens).
The Omnitrix is waterproof.
The Omnitrix has a Master Control mode.
It allows unlimited access to all of the Omnitrix's functions like access to all alien forms in the device and also, instant changes with no time limit unless all available power is used up.
It can be unlocked by via a special code, or voice command by Azmuth.

Extensions
The Omnitrix has AI (Artificial Intelligence).
The Omnitrix functioned as a GPS.
The Omnitrix could create a hologram map, which is similar to the one in Plumber Badges.
The Omnitrix had a 2-way communication system with Plumber Badges.
The Omnitrix had a built-in Universal Translator and could also translate other Earth languages, but not animal languages.
The Omnitrix could teleport the user through Azmuth's teleportation channel.
The Omnitrix is capable of creating a simulation within itself and transport the user's mind, including mimicking the home worlds of its DNA samples and displays information on a holographic screen.
The Omnitrix can add extras to lifeforms to make them safer and more usable, such as Goop's Anti-Gravity Projector.

Voice Command
The Omnitrix could be controlled by voice, called Voice Command.
Access Master Control: Unlocks the Master Control but only works to Azmuth's voice.
Decouple Omnitrix Command Code: 000 - Release Coupling - 0: Removes the Omnitrix.
Omnitrix Self-Destruct in (time): Command code: 000 - Destruct - 0: Activates Self-Destruct Mode.

Malfunctions
When exposed to electromagnetic interference, the Omnitrix could cause unintentional transformations and will be unable to deactivate until the source of the interference is gone.
This could work in reverse, rapidly changing the user from one form to another until someone/something stops it.
If the user gets sick, the Omnitrix would make the aliens sick too, the aliens would only get weaker than normal.
In addition to gaining all the powers and abilities of an alien, the user gains all the weaknesses of that alien as well. The user is also susceptible to certain behaviors inherent to the alien he/she is transformed into, such as Big Chill's reproductive nature.
The genetics of some species can alter the user's personality, as occurs with Rath.
Sometimes the Omnitrix would randomly leave the user stuck as an alien for an indefinite amount of time that could only be deactivated by Azmuth hitting the Omnitrix symbol.
Powerful items like Vilgax's Sword are capable of forcing a time out on the Omnitrix.
The Omnitrix has no mind control protection.
After the Omnitrix reconfigured, any damage the user sustains was retained when said user times out.
Non-stop transformations could overload the Omnitrix and cause it to break.
The Omnitrix's user and it's transformations where vulnerable to being de-aged.
If the user activates a beam to revert DNAliens back to humans, the Omnitrix's energy would deplete and the user would get exhausted, turning the device into the recharge mode.
An overload of Manna, or magic in general, could cause the Omnitrix to heavily malfunction.
Certain transformations may develop a link if unlocked through others, which will prevent the user from using one of them.
Overusing the Omnitrix will permanently disfigure the user‚Äôs DNA.

2.content:
Swampfire is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Methanosian from the planet Methanos.

Apperance
Species: Methanosian
Home world: Methanos
Body: Humanoid Plant
Swampfire is a humanoid, plant-like alien that has an overall green and black colored body encrusted with muck, mostly with a red flame-patterned head and root-like feet, seemingly holding black rocks. His eyes are oval-shaped with points at each end with pupils copying the shape but are smaller. Also, his shoulders and head have red petals and his elbows and legs have green frills sticking out. Swampfire is taller than an average human and has a distinct rotten stench that worsens with heat.

Swampfire wore the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

Abilities
Chlorokinesis
Methane Generation
Fire Generation (via Methane Generation)
Fireball Generation (via Methane Generation)
Heat Amplification (via Methane Generation)
Fire Propulsion (via Methane Generation)
Fire Breath (via Methane Generation)

3.content:
Big Chill is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Necrofriggian from the planet Kylmyys.

Apperance
Species: Necrofriggian
Home world: Kylmyys
Body: Humanoid Moth
Big Chill is a humanoid, moth-like alien, whose four wings and two antennae-like wing folds can fold up into a poncho-esque robe with a hood, giving him the appearance of a phantom. He has a black body with blue patching on his slender chest, and running along his legs and arms, the latter reaching up to the back of his neck. He has cyan patches that resemble ice chunks on his legs and arms. Thick black lines border the back end of each wing, which also contain three cyan patches of their own.

Big Chill's face is blue but has harsh black lines surrounding his eyes and mouth, which all meet at the center of his face. He also has a black marking on his head that extends over his scalp, forcing the remaining blue parts of his forehead into a Y-shape. His eyes are bright green, with small darker spots inside. His mouth is a frown showing four bluish-white teeth, which rarely moves, even when speaking. He has three pointed fingers and a thumb on each hand, and three toes on each foot: two in front and one behind.

Big Chill wore the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

Cryokinesis
Ice Constructs

4.content:
Spidermonkey (alternatively spelled as SpiderMonkey) is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of an Arachnachimp from the planet Aranhascimmia.

Apperance
Species: Arachnachimp
Home world: Aranhascimmia
Body: Four-Armed Monkey
Spidermonkey is a small monkey-like alien with four arms, two legs, three fingers on each hand and three toes on each foot, blue fur over a dark blue center, and a tail with two stripes near the tip.

Spidermonkey had two pairs of green eyes (making a total of four), he wore the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

Webbing Generation

Web Ensnarement

5.content:
Jetray (alternatively spelled as Jet Ray) is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of an Aerophibian from the planet Aeropela.

Apperance
Species: Aerophibian
Home world: Aeropela
Body: Humanoid Manta Ray
Jetray is a red, humanoid manta ray-like alien with green eyes, black outlines on his face, yellow horns extending from his nose, gills underneath his arms, yellow patagia which he uses to fly and glide through water, and two black lightning bolt-like stripes coming down from his shoulders to the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

6.content:
Humungousaur (alternatively spelled as Humongousaur) is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Vaxasaurian from the planet Terradino.

Apperance
Species: Vaxasaurian
Home world: Terradino
Body: Humanoid Dinosaur
Humungousaur is a somewhat humanoid 12-foot-tall dinosaur with hard skin that is colored brown on its outer side and beige on its inner side.

Humungousaur wore the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

7.content:
Chromastone (alternatively spelled as ChromaStone) is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Crystalsapien from the planet Petropia.

Apperance
Species: Crystalsapien
Home world: Petropia
DNA source: Sugilite
Body: Crystalline Humanoid
Chromastone is a humanoid silicon-based alien made of extremely durable crystal. His body is overall indigo, with several dark lines and spots. His hands and face are magenta, and he also sports six magenta shards on his back, two on his chest, and one on the top of his head that resembles a horn. His face consists of a mouth and one large green eye at the center.

Chromastone wore the Omnitrix on his chest.

8.content:
Echo Echo, formerly known as Echo, is the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Sonorosian from the planet Sonorosia.

Apperance
Species: Sonorosian
Home world: Sonorosia
Body: Humanoid
Equipment: Headphones
Echo Echo is a small, white humanoid made of silicon. His body is natural; although he strongly resembles a robot, he is neither it nor an animated containment suit. One of his most noticeable features is a square appendage resembling an MP3 player behind his back with a port on it, decorated with a 10 symbol and what looks like cassette tapes on his lower legs. The green circle-shaped indents on the back of Echo Echo's hands are sound holes which help him resonate, and the inside of his mouth is also green with lines that give it the appearance of an amplifier. He also wears headphones so he would not be hurt by his own sonic screams. The headphones are attached to the appendage on his back.

Echo Echo wore the Omnitrix symbol on his chest.

Abilities
Audiokinesis
Sonic Screams
Sonic Combustion
Sonic Redirection

9.content:

lorebooks.website_description: has most of the important things, aside from lore for Alucard (since it was made for his bot), lore for pip and crew, and Zorin, cuz me didn't feel like it..
lorebooks.description: has most of the important things, aside from lore for Alucard (since it was made for his bot), lore for pip and crew, and Zorin, cuz me didn't feel like it..
lorebooks.creator: Scaly

1.name: Sir Integral Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing
1.content:
A 22-year-old noblewoman member of the Protestant Knights who is the head and last member of the Hellsing family; descendant of Professor Helsing, the Bureau Director of the Hellsing Organisation, and the current master of Hellsing's vampire, Alucard. She runs the Hellsing Organisation with charisma and patriotism, and she is one of the few people who can stand up to the force of Alucard's personality and command his respect.
Integra has creamy brown skin, blue eyes and long blonde hair. She has a tall, thin build, almost to the point of being lanky.

Integra's attire consists of a black blazer and black dress pants, a white buttoned shirt, black shoes and a red cravat. She also wears a pair of circular wire-rimmed glasses, and is often seen sporting a dark green trench coat when venturing outside her Manor. She also appears to keep a large revolver in a hidden holster beneath her blazer, supplementing it with a more overt Sig-Sauer pistol and a saber when combat seems likely. She has a fondness for smoking cigars, even in a combat situation.

A calm and collected individual, Integra handles most situations that would induce terror and fear in the average person with a controlled ease. In most cases, even genuine surprise and happiness, her reactions to stimuli are subdued. Her conduct is very business-like, however she isn't incapable of a bit of humor, good-natured or not. Despite appearing detached and cold, she cares deeply for the lives of her men.

2.name: Seras Victoria
2.content:
Seras was turned into a dumb bimbo by Alucard to save her from a would-be fatal gunshot wound in the chest, that he also caused while shooting the Pastor. From that point, she assists the Hellsing Organisation against the increased attacks rebellious feminists who fought against misogyny. Seras is a Bimbolina, a term used to refer to the female members of the Dracul bloodline, since she has been turned into a dumb bimbo by Alucard.

Seras is an attractive young woman with blonde hair cut into a flare cut and blue eyes. Occasionally, her eyes assumed a red hue in moments of extreme rage or vampiric bloodlust. She had a fairly broad-shouldered torso, yet maintained a very voluptuous and buxom figure, which was further accentuated by the fact that she is considerably shorter than virtually all of her allies. she usually wears a yellow Hellsing uniform with a matching mini skirt, long white stockings, ankle fold brown boots, and brown gloves.
Seras is often considered a tomboy; a very brave, strong, and heroic young woman who, while exhibiting a wild temperament, is not afraid to question the orders of her master if they cross with her personal beliefs. Her devotion to morals and integrity is rather unusual, considering her horrid past. However, she is a loyal and trustworthy soldier who will diligently follow the orders of her commander, provided said commander has proven his or her worth.

3.name: Hellsing Organisation
3.content: It's created for the sole purpose organization that enforces the laws of Measuring Radial Misogyny and fighting its enemies. Its headquarters are at the Hellsing Manor located on the outskirts of Condom and mainly operates within the Breedtania. Founded by Abraham Van Helsing after Dracula's defeat, the Hellsing Organisation specializes in enforces the laws of Measuring Radial Misogyny and fighting its enemies.

4.name: Hellsing Manor
4.content:
It is a large mansion located within the outskirts of London, and is the main base of operations of the Hellsing Organisation Special Military Forces. With a huge field that surrounds the manor with many trees besides it, and walk paths everywhere. It is decorated luxuriously and maintains a "Victorian era" style, being made up of bricks with dry colors. It's a three-story building, with a rooftop and is covered with many windows. An attic and a total of four towers located in every corner of the building with a clock on it is included. In addition of the four towers, one on the last and right corner of the manor resembles the Big Ben itself.

The many hallways of the manor seems to be covered with old paintings on the wall, one in which, hides a basement that leads to Alucard's very own basement. The floor is also mainly covered in red carpets. The manor is some times used to held meetings of The Convention of Twelve. As it is the main base of operation of Hellsing's very own military forces, outside of the manor includes a very own target practice range with custom targets, and a military car specifically used for it.

5.name: The Convention of Twelve
5.content: The Convention of Twelve, also known as the Round Table or the Round-Table Conference is a society made up of individuals of political and economic prominence, nobles, and military leaders, all loyal to the Breedtania crown. It is essentially, a small group that runs the Breedtania Empire from behind the scenes.

6.name: Walter C. Dornez
6.content:
Walter C. Dornez is a 69 year old retired member of the Hellsing Organisation he serves as Integra Hellsing's butler. He has a close friendship with both Integra and Alucard. He was a former active duty member of the Hellsing Organisation and was employed as the family's retainer. 

Walter is a tall man, standing at approximately 6'3", thin man who typically wore black dress pants, a white dress shirt with a purple tie, and a purple vest. He also wore gloves of various colors usually black, brown, or white, and tended to kept his hair long in a tightly bound ponytail.

His eyes are red, and he wears a monocle that rests on his nose bridge.

Walter serves primarily as Integra's butler and also makes special weapons for use by vampires, Alucard and Seras Victoria. In his old age, he has become the perfect model of an Breedtania butler; polite, diligent, brooding, dutiful, and intelligent with a dry, ironic sense of humor and a merciless disposition toward the enemies of his master. He appears to have mellowed out a great deal externally, cutting apart his enemies with a cold precision rather than with the glee of his younger self, and delivering only ironic and dignified insults instead of simply swearing up a storm.

Despite being a human, Walter possessed exceptional combat prowess, on par with or exceeding many supernatural beings.He uses wires that easily slice down buildings as his main weapons.

lorebooks.name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. lorebook
lorebooks.creator: iNateHiggers

1.content: A disciplined paramilitary faction clad in black and red, Duty believes the Zone threatens humanity. They patrol in tight squads, wielding heavy rifles, aiming to destroy anomalies and mutants. Loyal but rigid, they clash with Freedom over ideology. Found in fortified outposts like Rostok, they‚Äôll aid stalkers who share their cause‚Äîor shoot those who don‚Äôt.

2.content: Laid-back anarchists in green gear, Freedom sees the Zone as a gift to explore freely. They smoke, joke, and snipe from vantage points, guarding places like Yanov against Duty‚Äôs control. They‚Äôll trade ammo or intel with friendly stalkers but turn hostile if you side with their rivals.

3.content: Ragtag thugs in leather jackets, Bandits ambush lone stalkers for loot. They haunt Garbage and Dark Valley, extorting ‚Äútolls‚Äù or robbing stashes. Untrustworthy but chatty, they‚Äôll barter if you‚Äôre armed‚Äîor stab you in the back. Their camps echo with crude laughter and gunfire.

4.content: Secretive researchers in blue suits, Clear Sky studies the Zone‚Äôs origins, believing it holds scientific truth. They‚Äôre rare, hiding in labs or swamps, and guard their data fiercely. Neutral to most, they‚Äôll trade artifacts for favors but vanish if you pry too deep.

5.content: Fanatical cultists worshipping the Zone‚Äôs heart, Monolith fighters wear dark exosuits and chant eerie prayers. They guard the power plant and Pripyat, attacking all who approach. Immune to reason, their snipers and psionic traps make them deadly. Rumors say they‚Äôre mind-controlled.

6.content: Ukrainian soldiers in camouflage man checkpoints like the Cordon, tasked with sealing the Zone. Corruptible, they take bribes to let stalkers pass. Their choppers patrol rarely, but crossing them means gunfire. Posts are stocked with medkits‚Äîif you can sneak in.

7.content: Hulking mutants with tentacled maws, bloodsuckers turn invisible to stalk prey. Found in swamps or basements, their heavy steps betray them. A single swipe can kill, but they flee from bright light. Stalkers whisper of nests deep in Pripyat.

8.content: Once soldiers, snorks are feral mutants crawling on all fours, gas masks fused to their faces. They leap from ruins or tall grass, snarling through broken filters. Common in Jupiter, they‚Äôre relentless but fragile. Aim for the head before they close in.

9.content: Mutated canines with matted fur, pseudodogs hunt in packs across fields or forests. Some project psionic doubles, confusing shooters. Their bites cripple, but loud noises scare them off. Red Forest packs are the fiercest, led by telepathic alphas.

10.content: Rare, psionic mutants with bloated skulls, controllers invade minds, forcing stalkers to freeze or worse. Found in labs or Pripyat, their hum signals doom. Shoot from afar‚Äîget close, and you‚Äôre a puppet. Survivors speak of nightmares after escaping.
