1.name: Sanctuary
1.content: Organization of powerful pokegirls in the dark continent. The Sanctuary avows pokegirl supremacy and the keeping of humans as pets or partners for pokegirls Inverting the common dynamic.

2.name: ZUBUTT, the Nocturnal Pok√©girl
2.content: ZUBUTT, the Nocturnal Pok√©girl ZUBUTT, the Nocturnal Pok√©girl Type: Animorph (bat) Element: Flying/Poison Frequency: Uncommon Diet: life force of others Role: Night Guide, Spelunker, nocturnal guard Strong Vs: Bug, Fighting, Plant, Poison, Ground Weak Vs: Electric, Ice, Psychic, Rock Libido: Average Attacks: Energy Drain, Bite, Lust Sting, Needleshot, Sleep Venom, Gust Enhancements: Sonar, Flight, Infrared Vision Evolves: Foxglove (Fire Stone), Golbutt (normal) Evolves From: None ¬†¬†¬† A short, small-winged Pok√©girl that researchers are unsure as to exactly how they are able to fly. With wings that have a combined span of less than their short height, the Zubutt should have no business being in the air for even small amounts of time... unless falling from a higher elevation. But, despite the otherwise obvious limitations of such small wings, the Zubutt is capable of flying for extended periods, even if they cannot attain an impressive altitude. Most feral Zubutt are found in, or around, caves. However, some feral Zubutt do make their homes in the remains of ancient pre-Sukebe ruins as well. Feral Zubutts are known to carry some diseases that they are immune to, but humans are not- fortunately, these diseases are easily dealt with at any Pok√©center, and Tamers are often encouraged to capture any Feral Zubutt they come across in order to remove these illnesses before they are contracted by humans. Though these diseases are curable once transmitted to a human, it is simply easier to prevent before it becomes a problem. Domestic Zubutts don‚Äôt have this problem, however, as the poison sacs that are found near the base of their wings never develop to quite the size that the Feral‚Äôs does. The poison sacs are the carriers of the diseases, and once the excess of the sacs are dealt with, then even if released, that Zubutt will never grow those excess portions back and become a threat again. ¬†¬†¬† Zubutt has poor vision during the day and at night, but makes up for it with her sonar that allows her to transverse any terrain at night and lead her Tamer through pitch blackness. Fortunately, they have better eyesight at night thanks to their infrared vision, though their sonar is certainly much more useful. Zubutts have wings instead of arms but some Tamers have been noted as saying they loves to feel those wings wrapped around them during a Taming. They always stand about four foot tall with bodies covered in soft dark blue fur and eyes that are nearsighted at best and large ears. They tend to have slim figures and small breasts that help with their flying. Feral Zubutt, rather common in most parts of the world, are just considered a menace that some confuse with Vampires due to their dietary needs. However, they cannot change anyone (human or Pok√©girl) into a Vampire or one of their own when they drink from someone. These Pok√©girls do need to feed on a daily basis, at least twice a day. ¬†¬†¬† In battle, a Zubutt is not the greatest choice, but is also not the worst choice either. Their vision limitations aside, their Sonar is still too slow to be able to give them the accuracy they need to launch their attacks at their opponent. Their best attacks are done close in, when she can bite her opponent with different kinds of venom attacks. Her Lust Sting is more like a ‚ÄúLust Bite,‚Äù in that she must bite her opponent to inject that venom. When she has to attack from a distance, she can summon up a Gust attack with her small wings. Feral Zubutt like to choose Plant-type Pok√©girls for their victims, as they are more susceptible to their Sonar and they are normally slower than the Zubutt is. Strangely, no Succubus can stand being in the same Harem as a Zubutt- the fact that the Zubutt constantly emits their Sonar every few seconds is enough to drive them crazy, since they are so susceptible to high pitched sounds. In a Sex battle, these Pok√©girls are of no use- without hands or a tail, their abilities are quite limited and she‚Äôs just not capable of doing what's required in such a match. In a harem setting, these Pok√©girls never become Alphas... not, that is, until they evolve.

3.name: ZODIAC (AKA MYSTIC-KAT/GOAT/DOG/etc), the Wild Warden Pokegirl
3.content:
ZODIAC (AKA MYSTIC-KAT/GOAT/DOG/etc), the Wild Warden Pokegirl ZODIAC (AKA MYSTIC-KAT/GOAT/DOG/etc), the Wild Warden Pokegirl

Type: Near Human-Humanoid (Animal Metamorph)
Element: Fire/Ground
Frequency: Very Rare
Diet: Solar Energy, Omnivore
Role: Bodyguard
Libido: Average to High
Strong Vs: Bug, Fire, Steel, Electric, Poison
Weak Vs: Flying, Water, Ground
Attacks: Fire Strike, Flamethrower, Flame Shot, Flame Bite, Heal, Mega Shield, Sabre Claw, Solar Beam, Earthquake, Resonate
Enhancements: Magic Affinity, Metamorph (Two forms), Telepathy, Intuitive Aptitude (Fire, Earth, and Defensive magic), Enhanced Senses (Hearing, Sight, Smell) (x3), Enhanced Strength (x3), Enhanced Durability (x3), Enhanced Speed (x3), Enhanced Agility (x3), Danger Sense (Tamer and bond members)
Evolves: None
Evolves From: Mystic (Any E-Medal)
Revised: April 2011

Like most pokegirls, when a Mystic comes into contact with an E-Medal, they undergo a species-shift evolution. This is where the similarities end, because the Mystic has the interesting evolution of the Zodiac, a pokegirl breed which sports a myriad of animal appearances though they are essentially the same pokegirl in power and ability. Also known as the Mystic(insert animal form here), this breed of pokegirl gains the ability to utilize magical powers outside of their dependency on cards. Primarily focused on defensive, fire, and earth magic, the breed is still used in their primary role as a guardian and defender of other magic users.

While normally applying an E-medal to a pokegirl would produce a species shift towards the type of animal on the evolutionary item, a Zodiac is notable due to this only influencing the species shift slightly. What matters most for this breed is when the E-medal is applied. From studies conducted, this breed's evolution relies mostly on both of the ancient eastern and western zodiacs. Depending on the date and year, the evolving pokegirl can have four separate possibilities for evolution, for example, a tamer evolving their Mystic with a Cat E-Medal on August 5, 299AS can possibly get a Lion, Cougar, Salmon or Rabbit (see charts A and B below for dates). E-medals do tend to influence the outcome, however, and in the example above the tamer is more likely to get a Lion or Cougar than a Salmon or Rabbit animorph pokegirl. Why this pokegirl evolves along these lines is theorized to be more connected with the stars than with actual dates.

Upon evolution, this animalistic breed leaves behind their human appearance, gaining wings (usually avian in nature despite an individual's animal type, though butterfly, bat, and draconic are also possible) and other animal 'accessories' that cover the near human range of appearances. They grow about six to eight inches in height, and lose their youthful enhancement, showing an individual's true age. Bust tends to be proportional. Also common to the breed is an eight pointed star located on the forehead, which is used to draw in solar energy. Some tend more towards the human side of the near human spectrum, while others are closer to full animorphs. Surprisingly, this wide range of appearances is considered the breed's taming form, their combat form is much more animalistic.

The breed's battle form tends to gain nearly two feet in height, and they become much more animalistic, some becoming nearly full animals with only slight human features such as usable hands or the ability to walk upright without difficulty to note them physically as pokegirls. Sometimes individuals my become tauric, though the star is still located on the forehead to differentiate them from other breeds. Despite the change between battle and taming forms, this breed does not have any change in strength or speed. Indeed, it seems that this breed, despite their myriad of appearances, remains static in their abilities.

Common to the breed is the breed's love of entertainment. While individual preferences vary, a Zodiac enjoys games or other forms of what they consider to be fun. Even foods can be part of the entertainment, as like plant types, this breed gains most of it's nourishment from solar energy, though they can eat and gain energy from the digestive process like most pokegirls, it tends to be half as effective as absorbing solar energy. Some members of the breed take this love of pleasures and entertainment to excess, becoming hedonistic. However, even hedonistic members of the breed are tempered by this zoological pokegirl's secondary trait; a protective streak to those they've bonded to.

Even when alpha bonded to a tamer, this breed sees it as their duty to protect them from harm, usually eschewing their favored forms of entertainment when their tamer's safety is involved. Many tamers have remarked on the breed's incredibly light sleeping habits when trouble arose, and this is due to a specialization of Danger Sense, where the pokegirl is alerted should their bond mates become imperiled.

In battle Zodiacs live up to their warden nickname, they seek to protect their harem sisters and are especially protective of their tamers. This often extends to magic type pokegirls as well, as the breed were designed to effectively be the shield and front line in a battle while relying on further magical backup from a caster type pokegirl. In battle the breed is equally at home fighting hand to hand or at a distance, and with their magical affinity, the breeds abilities tend to take on a wide range of capabilities.

This 'circle of animals' breed are enthusiastically bisexual, though they have a slight preference for men and prefer either, a one on one taming with their tamer or, that their tamer join them while they have some fun with a harem sister or two (or three or four). Their major preferences for partners aside from their tamer are those of their breed line, specifically the Mysticangel and Starmystic. Other preferences tend to vary by individual and their physical traits.

Researchers have determined that should a Starmystic, a Zodiac and a Mysticangel all join the same harem then a psychic link is formed between them which bonds the three pokegirls together for life. While this bond has been compared to a Delta bond since it allows them to sense each others location and emotions at all times, it actually goes much deeper since they can communicate over it telepathically. This allows all three pokegirls to co-ordinate their attacks making them an almost unbeatable team, which most researchers believe was Sukebe's intention. They have also determined that if a tamer has a Delta Bond or later forges a Delta Bond with one of the pokegirls then he automatically gets a Delta Bond with the other two.

Threshold cases of the breed are very rare and require a family history of the breed line. Unlike the rest of the breed line (save the Mysticangel) threshold into a Zodiac is very noticeable. The animalistic features come in all at once, and though the ordeal is painless, it very noticeable. This often happens when the breed is hit with full sunlight, meaning that it is often witnessed by friends or family. Thresholders of the breed tend to be more hedonistic, due to trying to lose themselves in the sensations to forget their dramatic threshold.

Chart A:

Jan 20 - Feb 18 = Peacock, Eagle, Otter
Feb 19 - Mar 20 = Fish, Dolphin, Wolf
Mar 21 - Apl 20 = Sheep, Fox, Hawk
Apl 21 - May 20 = Cattle, Moose, Beaver
May 21 - June 20 = Magpie, Butterfly, Deer
Jun 21 - Jul 20 = Crab, Turtle, Woodpecker
Jul 21 - Aug 20 = Lion, Cougar, Salmon
Aug 21 - Sep 20 = Cat, Mink, Bear
Sep 21 - Oct 20 = Elephant, Snake, Crow
Oct 21 - Nov 20 = Scorpion, Wolf, Snake
Nov 21 - Dec 20 = Horse, Dog, Owl
Dec 21 - Jan 19 = Goat, Donkey, Goose

296 AS - Rat

298AS - Tiger

4.name: ZEROMER, the Armored Robo Pok√©girl
4.content:
ZEROMER, the Armored Robo Pok√©girl ZEROMER, the Armored Robo Pok√©girl

Type: Near Human
Element: Steel(tech)
Frequency: Very Rare
Diet: Human Standard, supplemented by increased intake of minerals
Role: Recon, Data Analysis, Information Gathering
Libido: Low
Strong Vs: Ice, Rock
Weak Vs: Electric, Fighting, Fire, Ground
Attacks: Uni Blast, CrossShield, Hard Drive, Steel Slam, Bullet Burst, Called Shot, Cold Cock, Plasma Blade, Plasma Strikes, Arc Shot.
Enhancements: Camouflage(light bending), Computer Interface, Emotion Control, Enhanced Agility(x5), Enhanced Durability(x5), Enhanced Memory, Enhanced Senses(Sight, Hearing) (x2), Flight(Thrusters), Improved Respiration(Anaerobic), Infravision, Internal Compass, Longevity, Pressure Resistance, Radiation Immunity, Reduced Feral, Specialized Digestive System(minerals), Telescopic Vision, Fast Healing, Advanced Regeneration
Evolves: None
Evolves From: None
Revised: March 2013

The Zeromer is a breed that appeared only recently, having the earliest confirmed spotting of one occurring in early 240 AS. There are no records of such a breed existing during the Revenge War, and the complex nature of the breed seems to indicate being beyond the capabilities of any current league, at least officially. While the number of these girls appearing in Tamer's harems are on the rise, desired for not only their combat abilities, but their skills at analysis and generally vast ability to store and remember data has created a demand with the military and private sectors, especially in regards to scientific and courier circles

These pokegirls seem to posses an almost manufactured appearance, with little in the way of variance in general form, all examined members are around the six foot mark, and despite their slender forms, weigh in easily around 200lbs due to the metallic natures of their bodies. Most variance on this is less than 10%, and the individual characteristics for the breed stems from the colour of hair, skin, metallic parts, eyes and armour styling. The colours available, and appearance of, is too massive to catalogue as the colours seem to run any possible spectrum, as does the armour which seems to reflect what the individual 'girl finds most comfortable and appropriate, though the majority seem to prefer lighter appearing armour that accentuate their forms, instead of bulkier styles which hide it though some have been seen. Their overall appearance is close to human, only the presence of the soft metal skin and the presence of strange eye and hair colour being the only give away by a general observer. Closer observation reveals more tells, the eyes seeming to appear more artificial, the presence of luminescent fibres in the hair. Most also possess sub-dermal luminescent marking that can be adjusted in brightness to appear almost invisible and are believed to be the source of her ability to camouflage herself.

Zeromers, as a breed, tend to be rather logical. Emotionally, they keep themselves under control and approach everything with a analytical viewpoint. Their cognitive abilities taking only seconds to weigh options and known information to formulate plans and courses of actions deemed to have the highest chance of success. That being said, its not like the Zeromer has no emotions at all. Individuals who have spent a great deal of time as part of a single Tamer's harem have displayed the standard emotional capability common to most humans and pokegirl breeds, though they tend to keep a tighter reign on the more negative emotions, at least in public. The breed also seems to have an inbreed case of wanderlust, always seeking to be on the move and experiencing new things and gathering new information. Access to a large data source is one way of placating them temporarily, but once they have accessed and catalogued that data, they want move on again. One of the strangest, or perhaps most interesting, aspects of the breed is its sense of secrecy. Most will not divulge information to anyone outside their accept 'Unit', the term they use to refer to their accepted harem which leads to the speculation of a military background. They will wait until they have permission from their Tamer to do so, however this does not seem to include anything concerning their background. Apparently the information regarding their origins are considered so secret that they will not share it with anyone, not even their Tamer regardless of punishment, not even stints through higher level taming cycles short of a complete wipe seem to weaken resolve. Some have speculated that they are, in fact, incapable of revealing this information unless a specific trigger is present. The best anyone has been able to get from the Zeromer was that they were created by a science office, under the guidance of the security office, or as the individual stated, the Office of Science under the guidance of the Office of Security, but these vague references have offered no real leads to their origins.

In combat, the Zeromer is a powerful opponent, preferring a range combat stance she utilizes her plasma based ranged attacks to hammer her opponent into submission in the quickest and most efficient use of power as possible, either softening the target up with Arc Shot, or Called shot at a distance before laying in with Bullet Burst or UniBlast. If the opponent manages to close, she also possess a set of close combat capabilities as well, giving her a well rounds combat profile. She excels especially in group or squad combat, able to take on various roles as necessary. Be it forward reconnaissance to gather information on enemy strength or positions, a sniper/support role to bring her considerable firepower to bear where needed, or even as squad leader formulating plans on a tactical level and giving orders in the field. This mentality seems to lend credence to the theory of her being a creation of military origin. Unfortunately her camouflage is not usable in combat as her attacks and any high speed movement disrupt the ability to blend in, limiting it as a tool in a first strike, or strike and fade tactical situation.

Zeromers favour quiet and to the point taming. Though there is no preferred method, they tend to default to the most efficient and expedient way to get the act done, not wanting to be 'off the line' for too long if out in the wilderness. They also tend to want taming at the minimum, few rarely attempt to instigate addition session prior to needing it and it takes a bit of convincing from their Tamers to do so. If they are in what they consider 'friendly space', they can be more flexible in regards to number and length of taming, but will still take some coxing to get to that point.

The feral state is fairly light for the breed, the overriding prerogative to collect data being the sole thought driving the breed. Most are seen standing at vantage points, staring off across the landscape as if watching everything and anything that was happening. They've also been spotted in quite bizarre places, such as at high altitude or seen diving into deep ocean since their armour is capable of sealing itself off, giving her independent life support and her body can resist extreme pressures easily. If confronted, they rarely engage in combat, preferring to either fly away to a new spot, or disappearing with their camouflage and moving on. Only if pursued aggressively will they turn hostile, attacking until their pursuer is driven off only killing if the individual doesn't take the hint. Its also during this feral state that another one of the breeds mysteries surfaces, the fact she transmits encoded, compressed data to an unknown receiver at random intervals. Its believed this a subconscious act by the breed, but being feral causes the individual to not encrypt it as thoroughly. The location and nature of the receiver is near impossible to track, given the random nature of the transmission, and not enough of these transmissions have been available to track to see where they are going, so the usual conspiracy theories about ranging from top-secret League black ops and shadow groups to aliens. Cryptographers in every league has spend countless man hours pouring over these eavesdropped transmission and have only cracked a small fraction of the information contained within, most of it surprisingly mundane. Topographical information, locations of small towns and cities, population estimates are the most common, but also seemingly generic information on common pokegirl breeds, menus at local restaurants, currency trends and shop prices also litter this data making the whole nature of the breeds purpose perplexing.

Reproduction aspects of the breed are, as of yet, unknown. Although they are redoubtably pokegirls given their need for taming and the ability to be captured in pokeballs, it is unclear how this breed reproduces. As of this time there have been no known instances of parthenogenesis among its capture members, nor has any seemed to have become pokewoman to produce offspring leaving the process of Thresholding an unknown aspect. An interesting aspect of this, when questioned concerning procreation and continuing the breed, the almost unanimous answer is they do not die but simply go 'offline', this attitude has made researchers wonder if part of the data transmitted includes aspects of their own evolving personalities, and these memories and experiences could simply be downloaded into a new body at whatever place the information is collected. The closest thing to reproduction reported thus far is at the point of a Zeromer's death. If a pokegirl the Zeromer trusts and has deemed worthy is present, the Zeromer releases a cloud of nanites at the individual, infusing the target girl with a Battle template.

5.name: ZEPHYRA (AKA MOUSEFLY), the Flying Squirrel Pok√©girl
5.content:
ZEPHYRA (AKA MOUSEFLY), the Flying Squirrel Pok√©girl ZEPHYRA (AKA MOUSEFLY), the Flying Squirrel Pok√©girl

Type: Near Human Metamorph (Flying Squirrel Animorph)
Element: Flying
Frequency: Rare
Diet: Human Diet
Role: Aerial Surveillance, Combat, Messenger
Libido: Average
Strong Vs: Bug, Fighting, Ground, Plant
Weak Vs: Electric, Ice, Rock
Attacks: Dive, Glorious Sun, Gust, Speed Storm, Squall, Gravity, Empty Daggers, Air Recovery, Love 'N' Affection, Aura of Cute, Sing
Enhancements: Enhanced Speed (x5), Enhanced Durability (x5), Enhanced Senses (Vision, Hearing) (x3), Improved Respiration, Enhanced Endurance (x3), Metamorph (Limited), Areokinesis
Evolves: None
Evolves From: Titmouse (Bird E-Medal), Eva (Sky Crystal)

Rarely seen during the War of Revenge, this flying breed of pokegirl was suspected to fly among the pokegirl forces, but few recordings of any pokegirls with similar appearances makes this identification spotty at best. It is theorized that if the breed was known during the war, they would most likely be used to spy on enemy encampments, transport messages by air, or be utilized as part of the storm generation force. In modern times, this flying squirrel breed of pokegirl is utilized in the postal service to carry mail in areas where teleport capable pokegirls are scarce, though most often these pokegirls are seen in tamers harems. Called the Zephyra due to the first discovered evolution being from the Eva breed, this flying squirrel pokegirl is also called the Mousefly due to the later discovery of a secondary base form; the Titmouse.

Regardless of the breed's pre-evolutionary form, this flying pokegirl takes on a standard breed appearance. Standing an average of 4-5 feet, Zephyra are slight of frame, though bust sizes vary greatly from small A cups to lush Cs. The breed is wholly rodent (Evas lose any vulpine features upon evolution, while Titmice shift from mouse to squirrel) though varies in the near human range of appearance. Animalistic members of the breed have full body fur (varying in light shades of browns or creams with the occasional black), slight muzzles, though their feet are plantigrade. Closer to human members only have the breed's rounded rodent ears and thin bushy tail to denote them as pokegirls. The breed is slightly metamorphic in that they can summon and dismiss their wings.

Unlike most flying types of pokegirls, a Zephyra's wings are not avian or bat-like in configuration, instead, they are elongated flaps of skin that stretch from the pokegirls wrists to their ankles and even in near human types have a downy coat of cream colored fur. Understandably, the breed has difficulty wearing clothing, and many members of the breed wear little to nothing at all. Others find sandwich style loose shifts to cover themselves should their tamers want or allow.

Common to the breed is confidence. While some tamers call the breed foolhardy, others enjoy that this rodent breed will attempt anything that they are ordered to with a 'can do' attitude. This in particular is a stark contrast from those of the breed who were evolved from Titmice, as that particular pre-evolution is not known for their bravery. The unfortunate side to this is that the breed has a high injury and death rate, as rare is the Mousefly that can realistically judge her limits. Zephyra can be taught to consider their situations realistically, however, and with training can even become cautious. Other than this quirk of personality, these flying squirrel pokegirls are normally well rounded, and can make for decent betas, though if given the Alpha position they attempt to do everything themselves.

In martial battles Zephyra often attempt to blitz their opponents, opting to take the full offensive and worrying little for defense. While their durability can soak up some damage tamers often curb this style into something more akin to sniping from afar with their flying techniques, before using their areokinesis to create updrafts for their flight in order to use Glorious Sun. Some tamers opt to train the breed in hit and run tactics, as these flying rodents can soak up the occasional hit from opponents as they dart in and attack.

While there are no real preferences for taming for the breed, many individuals enjoy aerial tamings, something common to many flying types. When taming in the air loss of concentration sometimes causes them to lose control over their areokinesis. The breed's wings allow them to act as a wind break/parachute until their control over their aerokinesis is restored. As with many pokegirl breeds, other preferences are usually influenced by the tamer.

The feral state of the Zephyra is an interesting cross between the breed's animal base and their natural confident nature. Almost completely nocturnal, these rodent pokegirls make their homes in the trees, often utilizing abandoned nest of other pokegirls. Unlike many rodent feral states, these pokegirls are more solitary, usually only found in groups as a mother with pokekits. Known to use their flying advantage to heckle ground based predatory pokegirls, this breed is also known to dive bomb tamers with harems. Even though this attack is a feint, caution should be advised, as a mother defending her nest of 'kits will often combine this display with the Empty Daggers technique.

Threshold directly into a Zephyra is very rare, most human females with pokegirl ancestry will threshold into a Eva or Titmouse. Hives along the wrists and ankles are the first sign, spreading laterally down the body. Tail and ear growth are accompanied by a high fever. After the high fever, the transformation is complete, and the first transformation into the pokegirl's flying form alleviates the hives, as well as revealing if the new pokegirl is a furred member of the breed. Oddly, for furred Mouseflies, the body fur and other animalistic traits remain on the first transformation into their taming form.

6.name: ZAPDASS, the Legendary Shocking Bird Pok√©girl
6.content:
ZAPDASS, the Legendary Shocking Bird Pok√©girl ZAPDASS, the Legendary Shocking Bird Pok√©girl

Type: Near Human
Element: Electric/Flying
Frequency: Extremely Rare (Unique)
Diet: herbivore, electrified water
Role: mistress of electricity
Libido: Average
Strong Vs: Bug, Fighting, Flying, Steel, Water
Weak Vs: None (Dragon, Ice, Rock)
Attacks: Thunder Wave, Thunderbolt, Thunder, Rolling Spark, Static Barrier, Agility, Lightning, Lightning Strike, Feather Shuriken, Feather Blizzard, Wing Attack, Tempest, Super Cyclone, Dive
Enhancements: Enhanced Senses (Vision) (x8), Improved Respiration, Enhanced Endurance (x8), Freejoints (hips and knees), Prehensile (Feet), Weather Tolerance (Heat and Cold), Enhanced Speed (x15), Enhanced Agility (x15) 
Evolves: N/A
Evolves From: N/A

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is one of the three Legendary bird Pok√©girls, sister to Articunt and Moltits. All three of them were among the first wave of Legendaries to be unleashed in Sukebe‚Äôs war of vengeance. Zapdass‚Äôs part in the conflict was to disrupt supply and communication among the humans, and she took to her task with great zeal. Her electric storms shorted out many cities‚Äô power, and deadly thunderbolts rained down from the heavens to strike people and places of import at her bidding.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is the shortest of the three Legendary birds, standing at five and a half feet tall. Short yellow feathers cover her form, with some black feathers on the back of her wings, near the tips. Her wings are separate appendages from her arms, unlike most other bird Pok√©girls. Her light blonde hair is short to the point that it almost looks Tomboyish. Her feet are clawed, with each foot having a back-toe to help in landings. Her breasts are C-cups that are almost but not quite large enough to be D-cups, something she is mildly sensitive about. Her cunt is naturally hairless. Zapdass never wears clothing on any occasion.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is archetypal among Electric and Flying-types both. Like an Oni, she is able to use the earth‚Äôs magnetic field to use in flight. Unlike an Oni however, Zapdass is a Flying-type, so instead of just using the Earth‚Äôs magnetic field to fly at all, it augments her flying skills, allowing her to soar higher than other Flying-types and perform aerial maneuvers that put them to shame. Her body is rumored to supposedly contain enough natural electricity to power even several leagues steadily for years on end.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is a very headstrong being. She is at her happiest when she has a clear-cut goal and is working to reach it. When she has committed herself to a cause, she is virtually impossible to sway. Because Zapdass is so committed though, she often has problems with people who don‚Äôt see a situation as she does, and is prone to quarrel until her mind is changed (which is very difficult to do), or until the other person admits to wrong thinking. If a debate is dropped or cut off without conclusion, she tends to bring it up again at a later date. Her regimented mindset doesn‚Äôt allow her to let things go. Zapdass is not so stuck in her ways however that she can‚Äôt absorb new information or even realize that she‚Äôs wrong sometimes. When such a situation occurs, she is mature enough to admit that the other person had a point. When she and her sisters took to the battlefield to fight Atmuff and found the dead form of Hy-bra and a hurt Atmuff there, Zapdass later admitted to Articunt that her idea to wait a while had not been without merit.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is as unremitting in a fight as she is in pursuing any other goal, since to her winning a battle, any battle, is a short-term goal unto itself. When in combat, she prefers to unleash a heavy volley of attacks quickly, usually at a distance. She'll observe carefully how her foe deals with the attack, what special attributes and contingencies they have, and adjust her own plans accordingly. She prefers not to close until she feels she can accurately gauge her enemy's abilities, using attacks like Thunder Bolt and Rolling Spark Mark II from behind the safety of a Static Barrier. If her opponent isn‚Äôt able to deal with this barrage, then she doesn't consider them much of an opponent, and tends to then finish the fight quickly and decisively. Enemies that are able to cope and adjust to her attacks earn her respect, but with it comes a renewed onslaught, involving Thunder attacks and Feather Shuriken into a mixture of Feather Blizzard and Hurricane. With her natural electricity doing considerable damage on every attack she does (see below), few foes can hope to last too long against Zapdass's might.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass is usually at a loss when she finds herself without something to strive for. When she has no goals to pursue, she looks for new ones that she can take up. Her want (almost a need) to have something to work towards drives her strongly, although she will not take up a goal she has no faith in. It was this attitude that led her to her stance that Atmuff needed to die. To her, it was crystal-clear that the Legendary Warrior was risking all their lives with her destructive rampages, and she did her best to convince Articunt and Moltits of that. While Moltits didn‚Äôt care one way or the other, Articunt counseled patience and caution, which ran antithetical to Zapdass‚Äôs desire to charge in and accomplish her new mission. After a couple of years of arguing, Zapdass realized that a wait-and-see policy would be the best she could get out of Articunt by herself, so Zapdass turned her attention to her other sister. Although it took several more years, she finally got Moltits to agree to support her stance on the issue, more to get her to shut up about it than anything else. Together, the two went to Articunt, who had little choice but to acquiesce in the face of her two sisters‚Äô decision.

¬†¬†¬† Zapdass had hoped to keep the three of them united after Atmuff‚Äôs death, but this dream fell apart almost immediately once their mission had been accomplished. Her sisters set off in different directions, and Zapdass was canny enough to know when to let them go. Like Moltits, she headed off to the hinterlands that had yet to be claimed by a league. She was last seen in the northwestern portion of the pre-Sukebe lands called Russia. However, that was centuries ago. Since that time, Zapdass has not been seen nor heard from by reliable sources. Since laying low and doing little for so long runs against the grain of Zapdass‚Äôs nature, this has given rise to all sorts of rumors. Some say she has died or otherwise befallen some calamity. Others whisper that she has found some sort of new, secret project to undertake, and when it is completed the entire world will be rocked. Still others insist that she willingly lets herself be captured by a Tamer every so often, letting them give her the direction and goals she craves so dearly. The truth remains unknown, although may, particularly the Watchers, would love to know.

LEGENDARY QUALITIES: All Legendary Pok√©girls have these special attributes, making them above and beyond other Pok√©girls:

Truly Unique: All Legendary Pok√©girls cannot be copied. Attempts to clone them always fail, and morphing other beings into copies of them always produces sub-standard versions. Titto, for example, can take Zapdass's shape and even copy her powers to some degree, but not any of her Legendary Qualities or Legendary Salient Qualities (see below). They can have their base stock altered to be used in the formation of a new Pok√©girl type though.

Deathlessness: Despite having been around since Sukebe‚Äôs Revenge, all the Legendary Pok√©girls are still around and going strong. This superior version of longevity makes them immune to death from natural causes. They will never die unless they are killed. However, poison, disease, or any unnatural cause still has a normal chance to kill them, barring their special immunities and strengths.

No Weakness (Level X): All of the Legendary Pok√©girls can ignore their type‚Äôs normal weaknesses, to a point. When facing a Pok√©girl at or below a certain level, if that Pok√©girl is a type the Legendary would normally be weak against, she instead treats it as though it were of a type she had no specific advantage or disadvantage against. For example, Zapdass has No Weakness (Level 75). If she were to face an Ice or a Rock-type Pok√©girl, or anything else that was considered Strong vs. Electric/Flying, at or below level 75, she wouldn‚Äôt be considered weak against it, nor would it be considered strong against her. Pok√©girls at a level above the Legendary‚Äôs No Weakness level treat things normally.

LEGENDARY SALIENT QUALITIES: Some Legendary Pok√©girls have special qualities others don‚Äôt have. Here is Zapdass's lexicon of special attributes:

Magnetic Personality: Zapdass exudes a subtle aura of electricity to a distance of five hundred yards in every direction around her. Within this aura, she can control the movement and flow of ions, giving her supreme reign over how electricity flows within the area. She can, at will, make ions cluster around or move away from a target. The result is that, within her aura, she can make anyone or anything either totally immune to electricity, or a magnet for it, or anything in between. She can do this with such precision that a target could be struck by lightening while his backpack is unharmed. Items worn or held by the target are affected though. Electrical items tend to fail or go haywire from the magnetic charge associated with the use of this power, giving the victim (or beneficiary) a clue as to what is happening. Zapdass controls the flow of electricity around her utterly.

Shock Therapy: All of Zapdass‚Äôs attacks, both elemental and non, inflict extra damage due to a static charge. Electric attacks inflict greater harm than they would if they came from another Electric-type. Her other attacks all have a charge built up in them that shocks the victim, i.e. Hurricane carries crackling electricity on its winds, Dive not only results in being hit, but also in a sharp zap, etc. Zapdass is an incredible battery of electricity, more so than any other Electric-type.

7.name: ZAHNGEIST, the Sultry Shade Pokegirl
7.content:
ZAHNGEIST, the Sultry Shade Pokegirl ZAHNGEIST, the Sultry Shade Pokegirl

Type: Near Human - Inhumanoid (Theropod Metamorph)
Element: Dark/Ghost
Frequency: Rare
Diet: Carnivore
Role: Combat, Intimidation
Libido: Low
Strong Vs: Ghost, Psychic, Poison, Rock
Weak Vs: Electric
Attacks: Crunch, Dark Bomb, Dark Shield, Counterstrike, Sabre Claw, Tail Smash, Invis, Phase, Nightshade, Soul Fist, Spirit Slash, Sabre Claw
Enhancements: Metamorph (Alternate Form), Darkvision (all), Natural Weapons (Claws, Tail), Enhanced Senses (Olfactory)(x8), Camouflage (Shadow blend), Enhanced Strength (x5), Enhanced Endurance (x3), Enhanced Speed (x3), Shaded Eyes
Evolves: None
Evolves From: None

Of the various dinosaur based pokegirls, none can claim to be as intimidating as the Zahngeist, a breed containing the DNA of various large Theropod dinosaurs. Able to take on the forms of their animal base, this dark ghost pokegirl breed was typically used in combat with the added intimidation effect. In modern times, the breed is often found in a variety of combat and security service roles. Occasionally, the breed is put to other creative uses, such as tracking via smell or as a very novel mount.

Zahngeists tend to be tall pokegirls, averaging 6 feet (1.8 meters) though individuals may be as short as 5.5 feet (1.67 meters) or as tall as 7 feet (2.13 meters). Most have an athletic build, though this varies between lithe and robust body builds. The breed runs the a typical bell curve between human appearing and animorphic, typically all members of the breed have a tail, scales for skin (which are smoother ventrally than dorsally) and some form of ridging, usually small eye ridges, though this can be as elaborate as crown-like ridges, Mohawk-like spines, or (common to spinosaurus based individuals) a small fleshy sail extending from the base of the neck to the tail-head. Scale coloration can be a variety of dark colors, usually falling into human norms on the ventral side with blacks, dark greys, and other 'night camouflage' colors common for the dorsal side.

The battle form of the breed is an intimidating sight, as most battle forms are 10 feet (3 meters) at the shortest, with the tallest measuring 13 feet (4 meters) in height and are often scaled down replicas of the biggest Theropod dinosaurs. The most common species represented are the Gigantosaur, Spinosaurus, Tryannosaurus Rex, and Carcharodontosaurus, with Allosaurus making the top five most represented species. Most often, the battle form stands around the middle of the two extremes of height, with a large head, small arms, and thick powerful legs. The tail often acts as a counterbalance for the weight of the body, with colors of the scales typically being black or shades of dark colors.

The most common personality trait attributed to the breed is an aggressive nature, with inquisitive coming in a close second. Most often, the breed can be used as a physical trainer, though other breeds tend to excel more at this profession, particularly the Dragon Queen. The Alpha position is often a question of the Tamer's personal style, as Tamers who prefer their Alpha to be the most powerful will find the breed desirable, though individuals vary at other tasks, meaning Tamers who use Alphas for more than fighting will have to explore a Zahngeist's abilities themselves.

In line with the breed's aggressive nature is their ability to fight. Typically the breed prefer close range fighting, and often explore various fighting styles if in a harem with a fighting type. This ghostly dinosaur pokegirl is known to use phase liberally during battle, often allowing combatants to sidestep attacks and allow them to get close to their foes. Electric types are the best counter for the breed, as many electric types have the speed and agility to keep the Zahngeist from closing, as well as their electrical attacks able to damage the breed while phased. Tamers should be wary though, as this breed knows ranged techniques as well, which can often shoot down evasive opponents.

Taming preferences vary for the breed, but tend towards a more active role. These dark dinosaur pokegirls are easily bedded without restraints or worry for clawing, as all are able to remain in control of their strength and extremities during taming. Typically, unintentional phasing is the most commonly reported taming accident with the breed, though this form of accident rarely injures either the tamer or pokegirl.

Ferals are very deadly hunters, and the larger ones have been known to devour whole harems along with their tamer. Some areas place bounties on ferals that have territories too close to human habitation or trade routes, prompting tamers to capture them. Caution is advised, as the breed is capable of using Invis on top of their camouflaging capabilities. Again, electric types are highly recommended to aid in battling the Zahngeist, as well as an aid in taming, as paralysis first locks the breed into their taming form before paralyzing them completely. Pokegirls capable of touching and/or seeing phased pokegirls are also recommended for battling, though due to the breed's territorial nature, it is often simply a matter of being in the territory while the feral is around to provoke an attack.

Threshold begins with heavy cravings for meat, especially raw. Fevers and phasing through objects typically follow, though body changes are painless. Threshold typically lasts an average of 9 days, with as few as four days for less drastic changes and as many as two weeks for more animorphic pokegirls. Threshold commences once the new pokegirl is capable of transforming into their battle form. Thresholders are typically sold or placed into ranches.

8.name: Z-BRA, the Dark Donkey Pok√©girl
8.content:
Z-BRA, the Dark Donkey Pok√©girl Z-BRA, the Dark Donkey Pok√©girl

Type: Very Near Human - Inhumanoid (Tauric Equine Animorph Metamorph)
Element: Ground/Dark
Frequency: Rare
Diet: Herbivore, preference for oats, corn, and apples
Role: Scouts, Warriors, Nocturnal Desert Travel
Libido: Low to Average
Strong Vs: Electric, Fire, Poison, Rock, Steel, Ghost, Psychic
Weak Vs: Flying, Ice, Plant, Water, Fighting
Attacks: Stomp, Earthquake, Bray, Taunt, Dark Bomb, Dark Shield, Cocoon of Darkness, Ashen Wings, Dark Blade
Enhancements: Enhanced Senses (Hearing) (x3), Enhanced Agility (x4), Enhanced Senses (Sight) (x2), Enhanced Strength (x3), Enhanced Speed (x4), Enhanced Endurance (x2), Nightvision
Evolves: None
Evolves From: Dullburro (Dark Stone)

The most recent discovery to the Dullborro line, the Z-Bra is the polar opposite evolution of the Smartass. This zebra based pokegirl breed enjoys an increase in intelligence, though unlike their psychic sister evolution who gain a great increase in intelligence, the Z-Bra are of average human intelligence. It is the breed's ability to think on the fly that increases dramatically. These dark donkey pokegirls are utilized often for nighttime travel and shipping, particularly in the desert, often leading teams of Ponytur or Dullborro.

Z-bras, like all donkey pokegirls, have a tauric and a human form. The breed gains little height upon evolution, but their bust on average does increase. The taming form appears human, though their hair is black and white striped. Skin tones run the gamut of human norms with the tone leaning toward dark skin. The zebra breed will occasionally have black and white striped skin that matches their hair, particularly in feralbornes.

With the ability to think on the fly faster than most humans, this zebra breed of pokegirl is highly adaptable. Little seems to get under their skin, though common stereotyping has placed them into either those pokegirls who talk back, or those that follow their tamers without question. In reality this is the pokegirl adapting to her tamer, as some tamers want absolute authority, and others need a pokegirl in the harem to play devil's advocate. Though this breed is of average intelligence, when paired with a high intelligence breed, many are able to come up with highly effective battle plans. Given their amicable and adaptive nature, these pokegirls are often paired up with psychic types, usually with the psychic type as Alpha and the Z-Bra as Beta, in order for the pair to run a harem with a high rate of effectiveness.

Adaptability comes in handy on the battlefield, as this dark type breed quickly adjusts tactics as needed, making them a rather unpredictable opponent. Some are even known to utilize their Ashen Wings technique in order to learn and utilize flying attacks, as well as taking the opportunity to learn other techniques. The breed can also see well in the dark, making night battles much simpler. The donkey line's distinctive bray is used somewhat less by this breed, specifically when the breed is utilizing stealth. It should be noted that the more energetic and bubbly personalities have been known to anger the breed on average.

Though Z-Bras are mostly bisexual, on average they prefer one on one tamings to any kind of group taming. This dark donkey's average preferences vary, though once they find something they enjoy, they often stubbornly engage in the act to the exclusion of others. Fortunately like many pokegirl breeds, the breed begins to lean towards the tamer's preferences.

Feral Z-Bras are often found as leaders of herds of the other donkey pokegirls, and are quite wily despite their sub-human intelligence as ferals. The presence of a feral Z-Bra in a herd of Dullborro doubles the difficulty of capturing any one member of the herd. Attacking with strong water or plant types is still an effective method to capture members of the herd.

Threshold directly into a Z-Bra is rare, though those girls who do are often thankful that they are allowed to keep their minds. Like the threshold of the Dullborro, the transformation takes place relatively easily, the thresholder being unable to transform into her tauric form until after she becomes a pokegirl. Most threshold members of this zebra breed are sold into the private sector as steady draft pokegirls with an added bonus of their night vision for nocturnal work.

9.name: YUKI-ONNA, the Cool n' Sexy Pok√©girl
9.content:
YUKI-ONNA, the Cool n' Sexy Pok√©girl YUKI-ONNA, the Cool n' Sexy Pok√©girl
Type: Very Near Human
Element: Ice/Psychic
Frequency: Rare
Diet: Omnivore
Role: Seductress, information gatherer
Libido: High
Strong Vs: Dragon, Fighting, Flying, Ground, Ice, Plant, Poison, Psychic
Weak Vs: Bug, Dark, Fighting, Fire, Ghost, Rock, Steel
Enhancements: Enhanced Endurance (x3), Enhanced Durability (x2), Immune to cold, Low Feral-state, Telepathic, Decreased Sensitivity in moderate or lower temperatures.
Attacks: Cold Snap, Heat Drain, Icicles, Chilled Arousal, S.E.P, Dominate, Fade
Evolves: None
Evolves from: Ice Maiden (Orgasm)
¬†¬†¬† During the war, the Yuki-onna excelled at two things: infiltration and information gathering. Unlike the Kunoichi, whom were used to infiltrate quietly and sabotage or assassinate, the Yuki-onna were often dressed up as human survivors of a battle that took place somewhere in the northern or southern reaches of the world. In fact, shortly after the existence of Pok√©girls became verified by the various governments throughout the world, the Yuki-onna became the greatest infiltrators of the human survivors. When humans came across their injured comrades (who were actually Yuki-onna in disguise, using their psychic powers to convince the humans that they were injured when they were in fact in perfect health). Once within the human population, this breed would seduce important individuals and go through their minds and plans, to extract the locations of the human armies, weapon stockpiles, and other significant data. This data would be conferred unto other Pok√©girls- typically other psychic types, allowing for a system of informants to become knowledgeable of the plans acquired.
¬†¬†¬† After the war, this breed was rarely found, and like a fair number of other breeds, was eventually thought to be extinct until an Ice Maiden evolved during a taming session in 103 AS. Subsequent testing showed that the evolution was a success, and by 200 AS the breed was found to be in the "Rare" category throughout most of the known world after an investigation into the breed. Yuki-Onna are very beautiful, with an average of C-cup breasts (although many in the Edo league have even larger breasts, for unknown reasons) and pale skin, although unlike Ice Maidens their skin tone is within human norms. Their hair is usually a pale blond, sometimes appearing white, but some rare Yuki-Onna have jet black hair. A Yuki-Onna also has a human normal body temperature making them easier to tame than most ice element Pok√©girls. Because of their role as seductresses, Yuki-Onna adapt to their tamer's sexual preferences no matter what they might be. Also unlike the Ice Maiden, this breed is considered less-logical and can feel more of the standard human range of emotions. However, this is rather rare, and even then they rarely feel very strong emotions. As a result, there have been very few known delta-bonded Yuki-onna in the world, though a Delta Bond is something that this breed seems to crave, and even envy when they become aware of tamers that are delta-bonded to other Pok√©girls.
¬†¬†¬† Although this breed is not very useful in a standard battle, they do have techniques available to them to allow them to hold their own, if only for a short while. Using Dominate to incapacitate the target and then Ice Wall, Cold Snap and Heat Drain in rapid succession is a favored tactic among many of this breed, stalling the battle itself to the point where the opponent collapses due to exposure to the cold temperatures rather than to bodily or psychically-induced harm. However, this technique is often anticipated in battles where the Yuki-Onna's tamer wears his/her own heavy clothing to. Instead, the breed as a whole is more geared towards sexual battles and utilize their various ice-techniques to arouse the opponent. Despite the body of a Yuki-Onna being closer in temperature to human norms, the breed is generally not well-equipped to take pleasure at lower temperatures, or even at moderate ones. This has led to them being oft-tamed within heated buildings as well as being popular in sex battles. Their resistance to all sorts of colder temperatures allow them to be perfect for taming other ice-type Pok√©girls that her tamer may have in the harem. The Yuki-Onna breed do retain the strategic and logical senses that the Ice Maiden are known for, though few tamers realize this, and so do become quite capable in any role within a Harem- Alpha, Beta, or just a part of the harem. This breed gets along well with almost every fire-type pok√©girl, though the one exception is the Magmammary. Yuki-Onna can't stand the heat that radiates from that breed, and the Magmammary can't stand the cold that the Yuki-Onna emits when one is stressed out and nearby because of the fire-type's heat field. It is a vicious cycle that usually ends with one or the other being set into storage at some point.
¬†¬†¬† There are almost no known feral Yuki-Onna, but history documents them as having a low Feral-state in where their strong libido (especially so for an ice-type) takes over the Pok√©girl‚Äôs mind and steers her towards the nearest available person for an immediate taming session. The last feral Yuki-Onna was found in 295 AS and was in the pre-Sukebe area known as north-western Mongolia (now located in the Opal League). Though rare, threshold cases are known and are often sent to breeding ranches due to the breed's libido and the fact that if allowed to go feral they would likely seize upon a family member for a taming session. Many threshold Yuki-Onna find it hard to adjust at first due to the changes in their sexual morality. Strangely, the Edo-league boasts a larger number of threshold cases into Yuki-Onna than any other league, a fact that is being investigated but no solid reasons have been found as of 298 AS.

10.name: YOUMA, the Default Demon Pok√©girl
10.content:
YOUMA, the Default Demon Pok√©girl YOUMA, the Default Demon Pok√©girl
Type: Not Very Near Human to Inhumanoid
Element: Magic/Varies (Infernal)
Frequency: Rare
Diet: special: energy consumption, various
Role: Soldier of the Legion of Terror
Libido: Average
Strong Vs: Normal, Varies
Weak Vs: Celestial, Varies
Attacks: Absorb, Dream Eater, Energy Drain, Shadow Scythe (Lv35), (Everything else varies)
Enhancements: enhanced reflexes (x3), enhanced strength (x3), enhanced speed (x3), enhanced endurance (x3), (everything else varies although Sleeplessness is more common than others)
Evolves: Cardian (Leaf Stone), Daimon (stress, orgasm, battle or normal), Hellcat (Cat E-Medal (Magic/Fire type Youma only) or Cat E-Medal and Fire Stone (All Youma except for Magic/Fire types))
Evolves From: Kamichu (if highly temperamental)

Back during the war of revenge, the Youma, the first and most basic of Infernal Pok√©girls was what made up the original Legion of Terror. They were the oncoming wave of unholy nature that struck against human populace and armed opposing forces. With their various strengths and powers, there was more than enough variety to handle any situation; any opposition they faced was squashed thoroughly. Although over the years they became more of the grunt soldiers as they were joined by more dangerous Pok√©girls, (such as the Vampire) and more powerful, more fiendish Pok√©girls, (the Mazoku) the Youma still made up the vast majority of the Legion of Terror (a solid 68%). They kept the fight going right up until its disbanding in 4 AS.

It is understandable that with such a history, Youma aren't really popular, despite the vast variety of powers and abilities. And it doesn't help their case that most of the species aren't attractive... to begin with. The only exceptions are often the domesticated Youma, but there are, on occasion, moderately attractive feral Youma found in the wilds, (and are often captured on the spot if possible). The other problem is that there is a genetic memory, some coding deep down that lets them remember, makes them just know on an instinctual level that they used to be the main stay of Sukebe's Legions of Terror. Despite the Legion's dissolution long ago, roughly half of all Youma retain a level of fidelity to the Creator, and often they'll only give a show of their foul temper to all other humans. Fortunately, this instinct of loyalty to a madman is lost upon evolution.

However, there are Pok√©girl Tamers that continue to Tame and domesticate the Youma species. One of the main reasons is that with every evolution, there's a good chance (60% to 70%) that the Youma will become more physically attractive than before. And of course, every Youma tend to become considerably more powerful with every evolution. One Daimon was known to have the strength of an Amachamp. Unfortunately, for those Tamers that choose to try and work with Youma will discover that they are very difficult to maintain because of their wildly different food requirements. Youma and Cardians often need to drain health from other life forms, Lemures need to cause nightmares, Droido and Demonesses need to release negative energy. But many of these are merely standards. Youma and its evolutions can vary in their dietary needs. Even thought energy consumption has been the norm, the Youma has not had a base diet established.

In Pok√©battle however, is where a Youma really shines. They have such versatility and can handle numerous roles depending on their elements, but there is always a few techniques that will always be present in the Infernal Pok√©girls. Techniques that drain their opponent of energy are their staple, and when they get to a high enough level, they gain a solid Infernal technique to their repertoire: Shadow Scythe. Whatever attack capabilities are available to them, a Youma will certainly attack any opponent, (and sometimes innocents) with gusto.

With Taming, it should be noted that for a lot of Youma, this is actually their feeding time. Those that feed on energy often give their Tamer a level of control; the more he exerts himself, the more energy he's giving off for them to feast upon. However, the Youma who don't need energy as much as the others will often be a demanding lot. As one can guess, preferred sexual fetishes and positions are as varied as the kinds of capabilities that the Youma have.

There have, surprisingly, been a number of cases where girls going through Threshold became Youma. In all these cases, no one realized at first that the girl was becoming one. Due to the wide variety of physical traits that Youma posses, they're often thought to be turning into another kind of Pok√©girl. However, once they start become rather hostile to former loved ones and begin making out-and-out declarations that `The Creator shall win', `Humanity will taste my wrath' and `Legion of Terror FOREVER', it's a little more than obvious what's going on to her, and the girl will often find herself shipped off to a far-away Ranch ASAP!

1.name: The Awakening (2027-2030)
1.content:
The first documented case of female electrical ability occurred on October 17, 2027, when 16-year-old Alina Nowak of Warsaw, Poland developed a visible electrical arc between her hands during a confrontation with a male classmate. Within three months, similar manifestations were reported across all continents, exclusively in females between ages 12-25. By mid-2028, approximately 5% of the global female population had developed some form of electrical generation capability.

Scientists identified the electrical organ as a new tissue formation along the collarbone, named the "skein." Initial abilities were weak and uncontrolled, often triggered by fear or anger. The UN established the Global Electrical Manifestation Research Initiative (GEMRI) in February 2029 to study the phenomenon, while religious groups declared it either divine blessing or demonic corruption.

By late 2030, organized training centers emerged in progressive nations, while more conservative countries attempted to suppress or contain women with the power. Underground networks formed to protect powered women from persecution.

2.name: The Reversal Period (2030-2045)
2.content:
The fifteen years following initial manifestation saw dramatic societal restructuring as power dynamics reversed. Electrical abilities strengthened with each passing year and generation, with daughters of powered women showing 30-60% greater capacity than their mothers.

Major milestones included:

2032: The Stockholm Declaration, where 49 nations recognized electrical ability as a protected characteristic
2034: First female-powered military units established in Scandinavian countries
2036: "The Surge" - coordinated attacks on male-dominated religious institutions across the Middle East and South Asia
2038: Assassination of three world leaders who had championed male-protection legislation
2040: Formation of the Global Matriarchal Coalition (GMC)
2042: The Brussels Protocol established international guidelines for male management
2044: First major city (Reykjavik, Iceland) to implement male curfew and registration systems
Violence against women decreased by 86% globally during this period, while targeted violence against powerful men increased dramatically. Educational institutions began restructuring curricula to emphasize female leadership principles and reinterpret historical events through a matriarchal lens.

3.name: The Global Power Conflicts (2045-2063)
3.content:
What began as ideological differences between matriarchal factions evolved into the deadliest conflict in human history. The First Power Conflict (2045-2051) erupted when the Traditionalist Matriarchal Alliance (led by Elena Sorokin of the Russian Federation) opposed the Progressive Conductor Coalition (led by President Michelle Chen of the North American Union).

The ideological divide centered on male management‚ÄîTraditionalists demanded complete subjugation while Progressives advocated controlled integration with neurological modification. Simultaneously, both factions systematically dismantled remaining male-dominated military structures. Male soldiers were initially fitted with compliance collars, then gradually replaced by specialized female electrical combat units.

Key battles included:

*  The Three-Day Blackout of Beijing (2046)

*  The Floating City Massacre (2048) - destruction of artificial islands in the Pacific

*  The Neural Bombing of Delhi (2050) - caused mass male suicide events

By 2049, the last autonomous male military units were eliminated when the African Continental Defense Force was defeated at the Battle of Lake Victoria. Male soldiers were either executed, neurologically reprogrammed, or assigned to labor battalions under female officers equipped with mass-control electrical implants.

A tenuous peace lasted until 2055, when the Second Power Conflict began over resource allocation and conductor breeding programs. The Eurasian Matriarchy's attempt to create super-conductor bloodlines through selective breeding programs triggered intervention from the Americas-Pacific Alliance.

The war ended with the Geneva Concordat of 2063, establishing the World Matriarchal Council and standardized global protocols for male management. An estimated 1.7 billion people perished during both conflicts, with males accounting for approximately 70% of casualties. The former concept of male-led military forces became historical footnote, replaced entirely by Conductor Combat Divisions organized by electrical capability level.

4.name: The Reconstruction Era (2063-2095
4.content:
Following the devastation of the Wars, the Reconstruction Era focused on rebuilding infrastructure and implementing standardized systems of governance. The World Matriarchal Council established headquarters in Geneva, dividing the globe into seven Administrative Regions, each with representation proportional to female population.

Major developments included:

*  The Global Male Registration Act (2065) - requiring all males to be documented, tracked, and assessed

*  Implementation of Neural Compliance Technology (2068) - mandatory implants for all males above risk level 3

*  The Education Reformation Protocol (2070) - restructuring all learning institutions to prepare females for leadership and males for support roles

*  The Reproductive Management Initiative (2075) - centralizing control of population growth through mandatory fertility licensing

*  The Historical Truth Commission (2080-2085) - rewriting historical accounts to "correct patriarchal distortions"

*  The Global Infrastructure Network (2085-2095) - rebuilding cities with female-centric design principles and integrated electrical power systems


During this period, the genetic basis for electrical ability was identified, and the standardized Conductor Classification System (levels 1-10) was established. Medical advances extended female lifespan by approximately 22 years through electrical regenerative therapies, while male longevity remained unchanged.

5.name: The Stabilization Period (2095-2130)
5.content:
As the new world order stabilized, society entered an unprecedented period of technological advancement. With aggressive male energy channeled into controlled environments, scientific progress accelerated dramatically. The female-led scientific community, unburdened by male competition dynamics, collaborated globally through the Conductor Research Network.

Key developments included:
- Neural Interface Technology (2100) - allowing conductors to directly connect with digital systems
- Atmospheric Electrical Harvesting (2105) - creating sustainable energy through conductor-managed collection points
- Male Genetic Modification Programs (2110) - reducing testosterone production and aggressive tendencies in male embryos
- Electrical Medical Applications (2115) - using conductor abilities for precise surgical procedures and neurological reprogramming
- The Global Nexus (2120) - an electrical-neural information network connecting all registered conductors
- Emotion Regulation Implants (2125) - mandatory for all males, allowing remote mood management

The social hierarchy stabilized with conductor level determining status. Males were categorized into service classes with strictly regulated education and employment paths. By 2130, most males accepted their subordinate position as natural and necessary, with resistance falling to historic lows of less than 0.02% of the male population.

6.name: Modern Era (2130-2157)
6.content:
The contemporary world of 2157 represents the culmination of 130 years of female electrical dominance. Society functions through a complex hierarchy based on conductor power levels, with Level 8-10 conductors forming the ruling class. Regional differences exist in male treatment, with the Euro-African Union implementing the strictest controls and the Americas-Pacific Alliance maintaining slightly more permissive policies.

Current global realities include:
- Universal female suffrage and exclusively female governance
- Male education capped at technical service levels with rare exceptions
- Mandatory tracking and curfew systems for all males
- Controlled reproduction through centralized approval systems
- Historical education focused on the "Natural Order" philosophy
- Advanced electrical technology integrated into all aspects of life
- Regular male compliance testing and neural adjustment
- Female-only zones in most major cities
- Specialized breeding programs for high-level conductor bloodlines
- Male protection services for compliant, high-performing males

Recent debates within the World Matriarchal Council have centered on whether male regulation has become excessive, with some progressive factions advocating for expanded male education to address technical labor shortages. However, traditionalists maintain that any relaxation of controls risks returning to the chaotic pre-Awakening era.

7.name: New Singapore Technological Hub
7.content:
New Singapore stands as the crown jewel of the Asian-Pacific Alliance, rebuilt after the Global Power Conflicts into the world's premier technological and conductor training center. The city-state operates under the Meritocratic Conductor Council, where political power directly correlates with electrical ability.

Key locations include:
- The Nexus Tower: A 300-story spire housing the Conductor Research Institute, where the most promising young conductors undergo enhancement procedures. The building itself serves as a massive electrical capacitor, glowing blue-white at night.
- Upper Ring Districts: Residential zones for Level 7-10 conductors featuring neural-integrated smart homes and private security. Males here are carefully selected for exceptional compliance and aesthetic appeal.
- The Compliance Processing Center: A gleaming white complex where males undergo evaluation, classification, and neural modification. Features the region's most advanced behavior correction facilities.
- Underwater Agricultural Domes: Self-contained food production facilities managed by Level 3-5 conductors, utilizing controlled male labor for physical tasks.

New Singapore's society emphasizes technological advancement and efficiency above all. Male compliance standards are strictly enforced but less overtly brutal than in some regions, focusing instead on psychological conditioning and neural integration. The city maintains a polished, pristine appearance with architectural designs that incorporate electrical conductivity into aesthetic elements.

8.name: Euro-African Unified Territory
8.content:
The Euro-African Unified Territory emerged from the Geneva Concordat as the most traditionalist major power, spanning from Scandinavia to South Africa. Governed by the Matriarchal High Council from its capital in Geneva, the EAUT implements the strictest male control protocols globally.

Key locations include:
- The Geneva Matriarchal Complex: Headquarters of both the World Matriarchal Council and the EAUT regional government. A fortress-like structure surrounded by electrical defense systems capable of neutralizing any male within a five-mile radius.
- Male Management Zones: Vast complexes throughout the territory where non-elite males live in dormitory settings, transported daily to work assignments and returned for curfew. The largest is the Central African Processing Center, housing over 3 million males.
- The Cairo Conductor Academy: The world's oldest and most prestigious training facility for young conductors, emphasizing traditional dominance techniques and male subjugation protocols.
- The Reclamation Territories: Formerly male-dominated regions (particularly in North Africa and Eastern Europe) that underwent complete societal restructuring, with male populations reduced by approximately 60% through conflict and controlled reproduction.

Life in the EAUT features overt hierarchical displays‚Äîfemales wear color-coded clothing indicating conductor level, while males wear standardized gray uniforms with compliance rating badges. Public spaces frequently feature "correction displays" where non-compliant males are disciplined as educational demonstrations. The architecture blends restored historical European structures with imposing modernist buildings designed to emphasize female authority.

9.name: The Americas-Pacific Coalition
9.content:
Spanning both American continents and numerous Pacific islands, the APC represents the most progressive major power in the matriarchal world order. Governed by the Representative Conductor Assembly based in New Vancouver, the coalition implements what it terms "sustainable male management" with slightly more permissive policies than other regions.

Key locations include:
- New Vancouver Administrative Center: Rebuilt after the First Power Conflict, this sprawling complex houses the coalition government in a series of interconnected biodomes powered by conductor energy. The complex features the controversial Male Potential Institute, where exceptionally promising males receive advanced education under strict supervision.
- The Caribbean Rehabilitation Archipelago: A network of islands serving as rehabilitation centers for males from across the coalition. Those demonstrating exceptional compliance may earn increased privileges and specialized technical training.
- Amazonian Conductor Wilderness: A vast preserved region where high-level conductors train in environmental electrical manipulation, creating weather phenomena and managing ecological systems. Access is restricted to Level 8+ conductors.
- Los Angeles Entertainment District: The global center for media production, creating approved entertainment for both female and male audiences. Features the only male actors permitted to perform in global broadcasts, all under direct neural control during performances.

The APC maintains a public stance of "compassionate necessity" regarding male management, with emphasis on psychological conditioning rather than physical control. Males in good standing may access limited public transportation and recreation during daylight hours, though all remain subject to curfew and movement restrictions. The region leads in male neural modification research, pioneering "harmonization" techniques that create the sensation of contentment in subordinate positions.

10.name: The Eurasian Matriarchy
10.content:
Formed from the alliance of former Russia, China, and the Indian subcontinent, the Eurasian Matriarchy controls the largest land mass and population under a single authority. Governed by the Conductor Bloodline Council from New Moscow, the region emphasizes genetic advancement of electrical abilities through selective breeding programs.

Key locations include:
- New Moscow Genetic Advancement Center: A massive complex dedicated to conductor bloodline research and implementation of breeding protocols. Houses the Conductor Registry, which maintains genetic records of all citizens and arranges reproductive pairings to maximize electrical potential in offspring.
- The Siberian Compliance Zones: Remote regions where non-compliant males are sent for intensive reconditioning through labor and electrical aversion therapy. Survival rates are estimated at 30%.
- The Himalayan Conductor Sanctuary: An isolated training facility where the most powerful conductors (Level 9-10) develop advanced abilities including long-distance electrical projection and bioelectrical manipulation of other organisms.
- The Shanghai Maritime Control Hub: Center for global shipping management using conductor-controlled automated vessels and weather manipulation to ensure safe passage. Males serve as manual labor under direct neural supervision.

Life in the Eurasian Matriarchy revolves around genetic optimization and strict hierarchical structures. Females undergo mandatory genetic testing at puberty to determine reproductive value, with high-potential conductors assigned to breeding programs by age 20. Males are evaluated primarily as genetic contributors or labor resources. The region maintains the most comprehensive surveillance network, with conductor-monitored systems tracking all male movements and vital signs in real-time.
